verses.ar_he: מִבִּסְרְהוֹן לָא תֵיכְלוּן וּבִנְבִלְתְּהוֹן לָא תִקְרְבוּן מְסָאֲבִין אִנוּן לְכוֹן
verses.ar_en: You shall not eat of their flesh and you may not touch their carcasses; they are unclean to you.

verses.ar_he: יָת דֵין תֵּיכְלוּן מִכֹּל דִי בְמַיָא כֹּל דִי לֵהּ צִיצִין וְקַלְפִין בְּמַיָא בְּיַמְמַיָא וּבְנַחֲלַיָא יַתְהוֹן תֵּיכְלוּן
verses.ar_en: These you may eat, of all things that are in water; all that have fins and scales in the waters, in oceans and in rivers; you may eat them.

verses.ar_he: וְכֹל דִי לֵית לֵהּ צִיצִין וְקַלְפִין בְּיַמְמַיָא וּבְנַחֲלַיָא מִכֹּל רִחֲשָׁא דְמַיָא וּמִכֹּל נַפְשָׁא חַיְתָא דִי בְמַיָא שִׁקְצָא אִנוּן לְכוֹן
verses.ar_en: All that do not have fins and scales [that are] in the oceans and rivers; of any creature that creeps in the water and of any living creature that is in the water; they are repulsive to you.

verses.ar_he: וְשִׁקְצָא יְהוֹן לְכוֹן מִבִּסְרְהוֹן לָא תֵיכְלוּן וְיָת נְבִלְתְּהוֹן תְּשַׁקְצוּן
verses.ar_en: They shall be repulsive to you, you shall not eat of their flesh and their carcasses shall be repulsive by you.

verses.ar_he: כֹּל דִי לֵית לֵהּ צִיצִין וְקַלְפִין בְּמַיָא שִׁקְצָא הוּא לְכוֹן
verses.ar_en: Anything which does not have fins and scales in the water, is repulsive to you.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת אִלֵין תְּשַׁקְצוּן מִן עוֹפָא לָא יִתְאָכְלוּן שִׁקְצָא אִנוּן נִשְׁרָא וְעֲר וְעַזְיָא
verses.ar_en: These you shall consider repulsive from among the fowl; they may not be eaten; they are repulsive: the eagle, the white-tailed eagle and the bearded vulture.

verses.ar_he: וְדַיְתָא וְטָרָפִיתָא לִזְנַהּ
verses.ar_en: The falcon and the [tearing] vulture, to its kind.

verses.ar_he: יָת כָּל עוּרְבָא לִזְנֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Every raven, to its kind.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת בַּת נַעֲמִיתָא וְצִיצָא וְצִפַּר שַׁחְפָא וְנָצָא לִזְנוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: The ostrich, the owl, the seagull and the sparrow hawk, to its kind.

verses.ar_he: וְקַרְיָא וְשָׁלֵינוּנָא וְקִפּוֹפָא
verses.ar_en: The little owl, the cormorant [fish drawer] and the eagle owl.

verses.ar_he: וּבַוְתָא וְקָתָא וִירַקְרֵקָא
verses.ar_en: The horned owl, the pelican and the carrion vulture.

verses.ar_he: וְחַוָרִיתָא וְאִבּוּ לִזְנַהּ וְנַגַר טוּרָא וַעֲטַלֵפָא
verses.ar_en: The [white] stork and the heron, to its kind. The hoopoe [mountain splitter] and the bat.

verses.ar_he: כֹּל רִחֲשָׁא דְעוֹפָא דִמְהַלֵךְ עַל אַרְבַּע שִׁקְצָא הוּא לְכוֹן
verses.ar_en: All winged insects that walk on four [legs] are repulsive to you.

verses.ar_he: בְּרַם יָת דֵין תֵּיכְלוּן מִכֹּל רִחֲשָׁא דְעוֹפָא דִמְהַלֵךְ עַל אַרְבַּע דִי לֵהּ קַרְצוּלִין מֵעִלַוֵי רַגְלוֹהִי לְקַפָּצָא בְהוֹן עַל אַרְעָא
verses.ar_en: However, these you may eat of all the flying insects that walk on four [legs], those which have knees extending above their legs so that it hops on the ground with them.

verses.ar_he: יָת אִלֵין מִנְהוֹן תֵּיכְלוּן יָת גוֹבָא לִזְנֵהּ וְיָת רָשׁוּנָא לִזְנוֹהִי וְיָת חַרְגוֹלָא לִזְנוֹהִי וְיָת חַגָבָא לִזְנוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: Of them, these you may eat; the locust, to its kind the solom-locust, to its kind, the grasshopper, to its kind and the chogov-hopper, to its kind.

verses.ar_he: וְכֹל רִחֲשָׁא דְעוֹפָא דִי לֵהּ אַרְבַּע רַגְלִין שִׁקְצָא הוּא לְכוֹן
verses.ar_en: All flying insects that have four feet are repulsive to you.

verses.ar_he: וּלְאִלֵין תִּסְתָּאָבוּן כָּל דְיִקְרַב בִּנְבִלְתְּהוֹן יְהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמשָׁא
verses.ar_en: As for these, [animals], you can be made unclean; all those who touch their carcasses shall be unclean until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל דְיִטוֹל:מִנְבִלְתְּהוֹן יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Anyone who carries of their carcasses; shall wash his garments and is unclean until the evening.

verses.ar_he: לְכָל בְּעִירָא דִי הִיא סְדִיקָא פַרְסָתָא וְטִלְפִין לֵיתָהָא מַטִלְפָא וּפִשְׁרָא לֵיתָהָא מַסְקָא מְסָאֲבִין אִנוּן לְכוֹן כָּל דְיִקְרַב בְּהוֹן יְהֵי מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: Thus every animal that has cloven hooves but its hooves are not [completely] split and it does not bring up its cud [dissolved food], they are unclean to you; all who touch them shall become unclean.

verses.ar_he: וְכֹל דִמְהַלֵךְ עַל יְדוֹהִי בְּכָל חַיְתָא דִמְהַלְכָא עַל אַרְבַּע מְסַאֲבִין אִנוּן לְכוֹן כָּל דְיִקְרַב בִּנְבִלְתְּהוֹן יְהֵא מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: All [animals] that walk on their paws among all the living creatures that walk on four legs, they are unclean to you. All who touch their carcasses shall be unclean until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וּדְיִטוֹל יָת נְבִלְתְּהוֹן יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא מְסַאֲבִין אִנוּן לְכוֹן
verses.ar_en: Whoever carries their carcasses shall wash his garments and is unclean until the evening; they are unclean to you.

verses.ar_he: וְדֵין לְכוֹן מְסַאָבָא דְּרִחֲשָׁא דְרָחֵשׁ עַל אַרְעָא חֻלְדָא וְעַכְבָּרָא וְצָבָא לִזְנוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: These [also] are unclean to you among all creeping creatures that crawl on the ground; the weasel, the mouse and the toad, to its kind.

verses.ar_he: וְיָלָא וְכוֹחָא וְחֻלְטֵיתָא וְחֻמְטָא וְאָשׁוּתָא
verses.ar_en: The hedgehog, the chameleon, the lizard, the slug and the mole.

verses.ar_he: אִלֵין דִמְסַאֲבִין לְכוֹן בְּכָל רִחֲשָׁא כֹּל דְיִקְרַב בְּהוֹן בְּמוֹתְהוֹן יְהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: These are unclean to you among all the creeping creatures. Whoever touches them when they are dead shall be unclean until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל דִי יִפֵּל עֲלוֹהִי מִנְהוֹן בְּמוֹתְהוֹן יְהֵי מְסָאָב מִכָּל מָאן דְעָא אוֹ לְבוּשׁ אוֹ מְשַׁךְ אוֹ שָׂק כָּל מָאן דִי תִתְעֲבֵד עִבִידָא בְּהוֹן בְּמַיָא יִתָּעַל וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא וְיִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: Everything, wherever a part of them may fall when they are dead, shall become unclean, such as a wooden vessel, or a garment, or a hide or a sack. Every vessel with which work is done, shall be brought [put] into water, and remains unclean until the evening, [then] it becomes clean.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל מָאן דַחֲסַף דִי יִפֵּל מִנְהוֹן לְגַוֵהּ כֹּל דִי בְגַוֵהּ יִסְתָּאַב וְיָתֵהּ תְּתַבְּרוּן
verses.ar_en: Every earthen vessel into which a part of them may fall, everything that is within it becomes unclean, and you shall break it.

verses.ar_he: מִכָּל מֵיכְלָא דְמִתְאֲכֵל דִי יַעֲלוּן עֲלוֹהִי מַיָא יְהֵי מְסָאָב וְכָל מַשְׁקֵה דִי יִשְׁתֵּתֵי בְּכָל מָאן יְהֵי מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: Of all foods that are eaten upon which water comes, shall be unclean. Every beverage that is drunk, in any vessel, shall be impure.

verses.ar_he: וְכֹל דִי יִפֹּל מִנְבִלְתְּהוֹן עֲלוֹהִי יְהֵי מְסָאָב תַּנוּר וְכִירַיִם יִתָּרְעוּן מְסַאֲבִין אִנוּן וּמְסַאֲבִין יְהוֹן לְכוֹן
verses.ar_en: Everything upon which any part of their carcasses fall, shall be unclean [even] an oven and a hearth shall be shattered, they are unclean and they shall be unclean to you.

verses.ar_he: בְּרַם מַעְיָן וְגוֹב בֵּית כְּנִישׁוּת מַיָא יְהֵי דְכֵי וּדְיִקְרַב בִּנְבִלְתְּהוֹן יְהֵי מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: However, a well-spring and a pit, a gathering of [place of gathered] water, shall be pure. [But] that which touches their carcasses shall be unclean.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲרֵי יִפֵּל מִנְבִלְתְּהוֹן עַל כָּל בַּר זְרַע זֵרוּעַ דִי יִזְדְרָע דְכֵי הוּא
verses.ar_en: If any part of their carcasses falls on any sowing seed that will be planted, it remains [ritually] clean.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲרֵי יִתְיַהֲבוּן מַיָא עַל בַּר זַרְעָא וְיִפֵּל מִנְבִלְתְּהוֹן עֲלוֹהִי מְסָאָב הוּא לְכוֹן
verses.ar_en: If water was once placed on seeds and part of their carcasses fall upon them, they are unclean to you.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲרֵי יְמוּת מִן בְּעִירָא דִי הִיא לְכוֹן לְמֵיכָל דְיִקְרַב בִּנְבִלְתַּהּ יְהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: If any animal dies [of those] that are permitted to eat whoever touches its carcass shall be unclean until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וּדְיֵכוּל מִנְבִלְתַּהּ יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא וּדְיִטוֹל יָת נְבִלְתַּהּ יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Whoever eats of its carcass shall wash his garments and is unclean until the evening. Whoever carries its carcass shall wash his garments and is unclean until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל רִחֲשָׁא דְרָחֵשׁ עַל אַרְעָא שִׁקְצָא הוּא לָא יִתְאָכֵל
verses.ar_en: Every creeping creature which crawls on the ground is repulsive, it may not be eaten.

verses.ar_he: כֹּל דִמְהַלֵךְ עַל מְעוֹהִי וְכֹל דִמְהַלֵךְ עַל אַרְבַּע עַד כָּל סְגִיאוּת רַגְלָאִין לְכָל רִחֲשָׁא דְרָחֵשׁ עַל אַרְעָא לָא תֵיכְלֻנוּן אֲרֵי שִׁקְצָא אִנוּן
verses.ar_en: Whatever crawls on its belly and whatever goes on four [legs] or whatever has many feet; regarding all creeping creatures that crawl on the ground; you may not eat them, for they are repulsive.

verses.ar_he: לָא תְשַׁקְצוּ יָת נַפְשָׁתֵיכוֹן בְּכָל רִחֲשָׁא דְרָחֵשׁ וְלָא תִסְתַּאֲבוּן בְּהוֹן וְתִסְתַּאֲבוּן פּוֹן בְּהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Do not make yourselves repulsive by [eating] any creeping creature that crawls, and do not make yourselves unclean with them, for you will become unclean because of them.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי אֲנָא יְיָ אֶלָהָכוֹן וְתִתְקַדְשׁוּן וּתְהוֹן קַדִישִׁין אֲרֵי קַדִישׁ אֲנָא וְלָא תְסַאֲבוּן יָת נַפְשָׁתֵיכוֹן בְּכָל רִחֲשָׁא דְרָחֵשׁ עַל אַרְעָא
verses.ar_en: For I am Adonoy, your God; you shall sanctify yourselves and you shall become holy, for I am Holy and you shall not make yourselves unclean with any creeping creature that crawls on the ground.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי אֲנָא יְיָ דְאַסֵק יָתְכוֹן מֵאַרְעָא דְמִצְרַיִם לְמֶהֱוֵי לְכוֹן לֶאֱלָהּ וּתְהוֹן קַדִישִׁין אֲרֵי קַדִישׁ אֲנָא
verses.ar_en: For I am Adonoy, who brings you up from the land of Egypt to be your God. You shall be holy, for I am Holy.

verses.ar_he: דָא אוֹרַיְתָא דִבְעִירָא וּדְעוֹפָא וּדְכָל נַפְשָׁתָא חַיְתָא דִרְחֵשָׁא בְּמַיָא וּלְכָל נַפְשָׁא דִרְחֵשָׁא עַל אַרְעָא
verses.ar_en: This is the law concerning the animals and the fowl and of all living creatures that swarm in the waters and for all creatures that crawl on the earth.

verses.ar_he: לְאַפְרָשָׁא בֵּין מְסָאָבָא וּבֵין דַכְיָא וּבֵין חַיְתָא דְמִתְאַכְלָא וּבֵין חַיְתָא דִי לָא מִתְאַכְלָא
verses.ar_en: To distinguish between the unclean and between the clean, and between the living creatures which may be eaten and between the living creature which may not be eaten.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם מֹשֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe saying:

verses.ar_he: מַלֵל עִם בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְמֵימָר אִתְּתָא אֲרֵי תְעַדִי וּתְלִיד דְכָר וּתְהֵי מְסָאָבָא שִׁבְעַת יוֹמִין כְּיוֹמֵי רִחוּק סוֹבְתַהּ תְּהֵי מְסָאָבָא
verses.ar_en: Speak to Bnei Yisroel, saying, when a woman conceives and gives birth to a male child she will be ritually unclean for seven days; as the days of her menstrual flow [the state of her impure ‘separation’], she will be unclean.

verses.ar_he: וּבְיוֹמָא תְּמִינָאָה יִגְזַר בִּסְרָא דְעָרְלְתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: On the eighth day, the flesh of his foreskin shall be circumcised.

verses.ar_he: וּתְלָתִין וּתְלָתָא יוֹמִין תֵּיתֵב בְּדַם דְכוּ בְּכָל קוּדְשָׁא לָא תִקְרַב וּלְמִקְדְשָׁא לָא תֵעוֹל עַד מִשְׁלַם יוֹמֵי דָכוּתַהּ
verses.ar_en: For thirty-three days she will remain [in the status] that the blood [she sees] is ritually pure. She shall not touch anything holy and she shall not come into the Sanctuary, until the days of her purity are completed.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם נְקוּבְתָא תְלִיד וּתְהֵי מְסָאָבָא אַרְבְּעָה עֲסַר כְּרִחוּקַהּ וְשִׁתִּין וְשִׁתָּא יוֹמִין תֵּיתֵב עַל דַם דְכוּ
verses.ar_en: If she gives birth to a female she will be unclean for two weeks [fourteen days] as during her menstruation [‘separation’]. For sixty-six days she will remain [in the status] that the blood [she sees] is ritually pure.

verses.ar_he: וּבְמִשְׁלַם יוֹמֵי דָכוּתַהּ לִבְרָא אוֹ לִבְרַתָּא תַּיְתִי אִמָר בַּר שַׁתֵּהּ לַעֲלָתָא וּבַר יוֹנָה אוֹ שַׁפְנִינָא לְחַטָאתָא לִתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא לְוַת כַּהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: When the days of her purification are completed, be it for a son or for a daughter, she shall bring a lamb, in its first year, as a burnt-offering and a young pigeon or a turtledove as a sin-offering, to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting, to the kohein.

verses.ar_he: וִיקָרְבִנֵהּ קֳדָם יְיָ וִיכַפֵּר עֲלַהּ וְתִדְכֵּי מִסוֹאֲבַת דְמָהָא דָא אוֹרַיְתָא דְיַלֶדְתָּא לְדוּכְרָא אוֹ לִנְקֻבְתָא
verses.ar_en: He will bring it before Adonoy and atone for her and she will be cleansed from the source [impurity] of her blood; this is the law regarding the woman who gives birth to a male or to a female.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם לָא תַשְׁכַּח יְדַהּ כְּמִסַת אִמְרָא וְתִסַב תַּרְתֵּין שַׁפְנִינִין אוֹ תְרֵין בְּנֵי יוֹנָה חַד לַעֲלָתָא וְחַד לְחַטָאתָא וִיכַפֵּר עֲלַהּ כַּהֲנָא וְתִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: If she cannot afford [to acquire] a lamb she shall take two turtledoves or two young pigeons; one as a burnt-offering and one as a sin-offering. The kohein will atone for her and she will be cleansed.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם מֹשֶׁה וְעִם אַהֲרֹן לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe and to Aharon, saying:

verses.ar_he: אֱנַשׁ אֲרֵי יְהֵי בִמְשַׁךְ בִּסְרֵהּ עַמְקָא אוֹ עַדְיָא אוֹ בַהֲרָא וִיהֵי בִמְשַׁךְ בִּסְרֵהּ לְמַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּ וְיִתֵּתֵי לְוַת אַהֲרֹן כַּהֲנָא אוֹ לְוַת חַד מִבְּנוֹהִי כַּהֲנַיָא
verses.ar_en: When a person will have, in the skin of his flesh a spot of intense [deep] whiteness or an off-white spot, or a snow-white spot, and it forms on the skin of his body [like] the plague of tzoraas, [‘confinement’] he shall be brought to Aharon, the kohein, or to one of his sons, the kohanim.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא בִמְשַׁךְ בִּסְרָא וְשֵׂעָר בְּמַכְתָּשָׁא אִתְהַפִיךְ לְמֶחֱוָר וּמֶחֱזֵי מַכְתָּשָׁא עַמִיק בִּמְשַׁךְ בִּסְרֵהּ מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּתָא הוּא וְיֶחֱזִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא וִיסָאֵב יָתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see the plague in the skin of the flesh and [if] the hair in the skin-eruption has turned white and the appearance of the plague is deeper than the skin of his body, it is the skin-eruption of tzoraas. [‘confinement’] The kohein shall see it and declare him [to be] unclean.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם בַּהֲרָא חַוְרָא הִיא בִּמְשַׁךְ בִּסְרֵהּ וְעַמִיק לֵית מֶחֱזָהָא מִן מַשְׁכָא וּשְׂעָרָא לָא אִתְהֲפִיךְ לְמֶחֱוָר וְיַסְגַר כַּהֲנָא יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא שִׁבְעָא יוֹמִין
verses.ar_en: If it is a snow-white spot in the skin of the flesh and it does not appear deeper than the skin and the hair did not turn white, the kohein shall confine the plague for seven days.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא בְּיוֹמָא שְׁבִיעָאָה וְהָא מַכְתָּשָׁא קָם כַּד הֲוָה לָא אוֹסֵף מַכְתָּשָׁא בְּמַשְׁכָּא וְיַסְגְרִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא שִׁבְעָא יוֹמִין תִּנְיָנוּת
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see him on the seventh day and behold! [if] the skin-eruption has maintained its hue [remained as it was]; the skin-eruption did not spread [increase] in the skin. The kohein shall confine him for seven days, a second time,

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא יָתֵהּ בְּיוֹמָא שְׁבִיעָאָה תִּנְיָנוּת וְהָא עַמְיָא מַכְתָּשָׁא וְלָא אוֹסֵף מַכְתָּשָׁא בְּמַשְׁכָּא וִידַכִּנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא עֲדִיתָא הִיא וִיצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see him on the seventh day for the second time and behold! [if] the skin-eruption became dimmer and the skin-eruption did not spread [increase] in the skin, the kohein shall declare him [to be] clean; it is [merely] a [removed] white discoloration. He shall wash his garments and he will be cleansed.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם אוֹסָפָא תוֹסֵף עֲדִיתָא בְּמַשְׁכָּא בָּתַר דְאִתְּחֲזִי לְכַהֲנָא לְדַכּוּתֵהּ וְיִתַּחֲזִי תִנְיָנוּת לְכַהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: If the [removed] white discoloration has spread [increased] in the skin after it was shown to the kohein, who pronounced that it was clean, it must be shown a second time to the kohein.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא וְהָא אוֹסֵפַת עֲדִיתָא בְּמַשְׁכָּא וִיסָאֵבִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא סגִירוּתָא הִיא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see and behold! [if] the [removed] white discoloration has spread [increased] in the skin, the kohein shall declare him unclean, it is tzoraas. [‘confinement’]

verses.ar_he: מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּ אֲרֵי תְהֵי בֶּאֱנָשָׁא ויִתֵּתֵי לְוָת כַּהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: When there is a skin-eruption of tzoraas [‘confinement’] on a person he shall be brought to the kohein.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כֲהֲנָא וְהָא עַמְקָא חַוְרָא בְּמַשְׁכָּא וְהִיא הֲפָכַת שֵׂעָר לְחִוָר וְרֹשֶׁם בִּסְרָא חַיְתָא בְּעַמִקְתָּא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see and behold! there is an intensely [deep] white spot on the skin and it has turned the hair white or there is [an impression of] healthy flesh in the spot of intense [deep] whiteness,

verses.ar_he: סְגִירוּת עַתִּיקָא הִיא בִּמְשַׁךְ בִּסְרֵהּ וִיסָאֵבִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא לָא יַסְגְרִנֵהּ אֲרֵי מסָאָב הוּא
verses.ar_en: it is an old tzoraas [‘confinement’] in the skin of his body and the kohein shall declare him unclean he shall not confine him, since he is [obviously] unclean.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם מִסְגָא תִסְגֵי סְגִירוּתָא בְּמַשְׁכָּא וְתַחְפֵי סְגִירוּתָא יָת כָּל מְשַׁךְ מַכְתָּשָׁא מֵרֵישֵׁהּ וְעַד רַגְלוֹהִי לְכָל חֵיזוּ עֵינֵי כַהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: And if the tzoraas [‘confinement’] sprouts on the skin and if the tzoraas [‘confinement’] covered the entire skin of the [one affected by] the eruption from his head until his feet to the extent that the kohein can see.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא וְהָא חֲפַת סְגִירוּתָא יָת כָּל בִּסְרֵהּ וִידַכִּי יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא כֻּלֵהּ אִתְהֲפִיךְ לְמֶחֱוַר דְכֵי הוּא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see and behold! the tzoraas [‘confinement’] has covered all of his body, he shall declare the skin-eruption to be cleansed, it has turned completely white, he is clean.

verses.ar_he: וּבְיוֹמָא דְאִתַּחֲזִי בֵהּ בִּסְרָא חַיָא יְהֵי מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: On the day that healthy flesh appears on him, he will become unclean.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא יָת בִּסְרָא חַיָא וִיסָאֵבִנֵהּ בִּסְרָא חַיָא מְסָאָב הוּא סְגִירוּת הוּא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see the healthy flesh and declare him unclean. The healthy flesh is unclean, it is tzoraas. [‘confinement’]

verses.ar_he: אוֹ אֲרֵי יְתוּב בִּסְרָא חַיָא וְיִתְהֲפִיךְ לְמֶחֱוָר וְיִתֵּתֵי לְוַת כַּהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: Or, if the healthy flesh turns again and it was changed to white, he shall come [be brought] to the kohein.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא וְהָא אִתְהֲפִיךְ מַכְתָּשָׁא לְמֶחֱוָר וִידַכֵּי כַהֲנָא יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא דְכֵי הוּא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see him, and behold! the skin-eruption has turned white; the kohein shall declare the skin-eruption to be clean, he is clean.

verses.ar_he: וּבִסְרָא אֲרֵי יְהֵי בֵהּ בְּמַשְּׁכֵּהּ שִׁחֲנָא וְיִתַּסֵי
verses.ar_en: When a person has on his skin an inflammation that has healed.

verses.ar_he: וִיהֵי בַאֲתַר שִׁחֲנָא עַמְקָא חַוְרָא אוֹ בַהֲרָא חַוְרָא סַמְקָא וְיִתַּחֲזִי לְכַהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: If there was on the area of the inflammation a spot of intense [deep] whiteness or a snow-white spot tinged with red it shall be shown to the kohein.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא וְהָא מֶחֱזָהָא מַכִּיךְ מִן מַשְׁכָּא וּשְׂעָרַהּ אִתְהַפִיךְ לְמֶחֱוָר וִיסָאֵבִינֵהּ כַּהֲנָא מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּתָא הִיא בְּשִׁחַנָא סְגִיאַת
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see it and behold! its appearance is lower than the skin, and its hair has turned white, the kohein shall declare him unclean; It is the skin-eruption of tzoraas [‘confinement’] that has sprouted through the inflammation.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם יֶחֱזִנַהּ כַּהֲנָא וְהָא לֵית בַּהּ שֵׂעָר חִוָר וּמַכִּיכָא לֵיתָהָא מִן מַשְׁכָּא וְהִיא עָמַיָא וְיַסְגְרִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא שִׁבְעָא יוֹמִין
verses.ar_en: If the kohein looks at it and behold! there is no white hair in it, and it is not lower than the skin and it is faint, the kohein shall confine him for seven days.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם אוֹסָפָא תוֹסֵף בְּמַשְׁכָּא וִיסָאֵב כַּהֲנָא יָתֵהּ מַכְתָּשָׁא הִיא
verses.ar_en: If it spread [increased] in the skin, the kohein shall declare him unclean, it is a skin eruption.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם בְּאַתְרָהָא קָמַת בֶּהַרְתָּא לָא אוֹסֵפַת רֹשֶׁם שִׁחֲנָא הִיא וִידַכִּנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: If the snow-white spot remains in its place and it did not spread [increase], it is [merely] a scar [an impression] of the inflammation and the kohein shall declare him clean.

verses.ar_he: אוֹ בִסְרָא אֲרֵי יְהֵי בְמַשְׁכֵּהּ כְּוָאָה דְנוּר וּתְהֵי רֹשֶׁם כְּוָאָה בַּהֲרָא חַוְרָא סֲמקָא אוֹ חַוְרָא
verses.ar_en: When a person has on his skin a burn from a fire and [on] the healthy flesh [impression] of the burnt part, came a snow-white spot tinged with red or pure white spot.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי יָתַהּ כַּהֲנָא וְהָא אִתְהֲפִיךְ שֵׂעָר חִוָר בְּבַהֶרְתָּא וּמֶחֱזָהָא עַמִיק מִן מַשְׁכָּא סְגִירוּתָא הִיא בִּכְוָּאָה סְגִיאָה וִיסָאֵב יָתֵהּ כַּהֲנָא מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּתָא הִיא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see it and behold! the hair has turned white in the snow-white spot and its appearance is deeper than the skin; it is tzoraas [‘confinement’] that has sprouted in the burn. The kohein shall declare him unclean, it is the skin-eruption of tzoraas. [‘confinement’]

verses.ar_he: וְאִם יֶחֱזִנַהּ כַּהֲנָא וְהָא לֵית בְּבַהֶרְתָּא שֵׂעָר חִוָר וּמַכִּיכָא לֵיתָהָא מִן מַשְׁכָּא וְהִיא עָמְיָא וְיַסְגְרִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא שִׁבְעָא יוֹמִין
verses.ar_en: If the kohein shall see it, and behold! there is not, in the snow-white spot, any white hair and it is not lower than the skin, and it is faint. The kohein shall confine him for seven days.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא בְּיוֹמָא שְׁבִיעָאָה אִם אוֹסָפָא תוֹסֵף בְּמַשְׁכָּא וִיסָאֵב כַּהֲנָא יָתֵהּ מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּתָא הִיא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see him on the seventh day. If it has spread [increased] in the skin, the kohein shall declare him unclean, it is the skin-eruption of tzoraas. [‘confinement’]

verses.ar_he: וְאִם בְּאַתְרָהָא קָמַת בַּהֶרְתָּא לָא אוֹסֵפַת בְּמַשְׁכָּא וְהִיא עָמְיָא עוֹמֶק כְּוָאָה הִיא וִידַכִּנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא אֲרֵי רֹשֶׁם כְּוָאָה הִיא
verses.ar_en: If the snow-white spot remains in its place and it did not spread [increase] in the skin and it is faint, it is the [deep] white spot of the burn. The kohein shall declare him clean for it is [merely] the scar [impression] of the burn.

verses.ar_he: וּגְבַר אוֹ אִתְּתָא אֲרֵי יְהֵא בֵהּ מַכְתָּשָׁא בְּרֵישׁ אוֹ בִּדְקָן
verses.ar_en: If a man or a woman will have a skin-eruption on the head or in the beard.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא וְהָא מֶחֱזוֹהִי עַמִיק מִן מַשְׁכָּא וּבֵהּ שֵׂעָר סֻמָק דַעְדָק וִיסָאֵב יָתֵהּ כַּהֲנָא נִתְקָא הוּא סְגִירוּת רֵישָׁא אוֹ דִקְנָא הוּא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see the skin-eruption, and behold! its appearance is deeper than the skin and there is thin golden [reddish] hair in it. The kohein shall pronounce it unclean, It is a nesek, it is tzoraas [‘confinement’] of the head or the beard.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲרֵי יֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא יָת מַכְתַּשׁ נִתְקָא וְהָא לֵית מֶחֱזוֹהִי עַמִיק מִן מַשְּׁכָּא וְשֵׂעָר אֻכָם לֵית בֵּיהּ וְיַסְגַר כַּהֲנָא יָת מַכְתַּשׁ נִתְקָא שִׁבְעַת יוֹמִין
verses.ar_en: When the kohein will see the skin eruption of nesek—and behold! it does not appear deeper than the skin and there is no black hair in it, the kohein shall confine [the one affected by] the skin-eruption of the nesek for seven days.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא בְּיוֹמָא שְׁבִיעָאָה וְהָא לָא אוֹסֵף נִתְקָא וְלָא הֲוָה בֵהּ שֵׂעָר סֻמָק וּמֶחֱזֵי נִתְקָא לֵית עַמִיק מִן מַשְׁכָּא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see the skin-eruption on the seventh day, and behold! the nesek did not spread [increase] and there was no golden [reddish] hair in it and the appearance of the nesek is not deeper than the skin.

verses.ar_he: וִיגַלַח סָחֳרָנֵי נִתְקָא וּדְעִם נִתְקָא לָא יְגַלַח וְיַסְגַר כַּהֲנָא יָת נִתְקָא שִׁבְעָא יוֹמִין תִּנְיָנוּת
verses.ar_en: He shall be shaved [shave around the nesek] but he shall not shave [close to] the nesek, and the kohein shall confine the nesek for a second seven day period.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא יָת נִתְקָא בְּיוֹמָא שְׁבִיעָאָה וְהָא לָא אוֹסֵף נִתְקָא בְּמַשְׁכָּא וּמֶחֱזוֹהִי לֵיתוֹהִי עַמִיק מִן מַשְׁכָּא וִידַכֵּי יָתֵהּ כַּהֲנָא וִיצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see the nesek on the seventh day and behold! if the nesek did not spread [increase] in the skin and its appearance is not deeper than the skin. The kohein shall declare him clean. He shall wash his garments and he will be clean.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם אוֹסָפָא יוֹסֵף נִתְקָא בְּמַשְׁכָּא בָּתַר דָכוּתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: If the nesek spreads [increases] [extensively] in the skin after he is pronounced clean,

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא וְהָא אוֹסֵף נִתְקָא בְּמַשְׁכָּא לָא יְבַקֵר כַּהֲנָא לְשֵׂעָר סֻמָק מְסָאָב הוּא
verses.ar_en: the kohein shall see him and behold! the nesek has spread [increased] in the skin. The kohein shall not [even] look for golden [reddish] hair, he is unclean.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם כַּד הֲוָה קָם נִתְקָא וְשֵׂעָר אֻכָּם צְמַח בֵּהּ אִתַּסִי נִתְקָא דְכֵי הוּא וִידַכִּנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: If the nesek remained the same as it was and black hair grew in it, the nesek is healed, he is clean, and the kohein shall declare him clean.

verses.ar_he: וגְבַר אוֹ אִתְּתָא אֲרֵי יְהֵי בִמְשַׁךְ בִּסְרְהוֹן בַּהֲרָן בַּהֲרָן חַוְרָן
verses.ar_en: When a man or a woman have in the skin of their flesh—white spots.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא וְהָא בִמְשַׁךְ בִּסְרְהוֹן בַּהֲרָן עָמְיָן חַוְרָן בָּהֲקָא הוּא סָגֵי בְמַשְׁכָּא דְכֵי הוּא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see, and behold! in the skin of their flesh are dim white spots, it is [merely] scurf that has sprouted in the skin; it is clean.

verses.ar_he: וּגְבַר אֲרֵי יַתַּר שְׂעַר רֵישֵׁהּ קְרַח הוּא דְכֵי הוּא
verses.ar_en: If a mans hair falls out, he is [merely] bald; he is clean.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם מִלָקֳבֵל אַפּוֹהִי יַתַּר שְׂעַר רֵישֵׁהּ גְלוֹשׁ הוּא דְכֵי הוּא
verses.ar_en: If, on the front of his head his hair falls out, he is [merely] frontally bald; he is clean.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲרֵי יְהֵי בְקָרָחוּתֵהּ אוֹ בִגְלוֹשׁוּתֵהּ מַכְתַּשׁ חִוָר סַמוֹק סְגִירוּת סָגְיָא הִיא בְּקָרָחוּתֵהּ אוֹ בִגְלוֹשּׁוּתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: If there will be, in the baldness in back of the head or in the baldness in front of the head a white skin-eruption, tinged with red, it is tzoraas [‘confinement’] sprouting in his frontal baldness or in his posterior baldness.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי יָתֵהּ כַּהֲנָא וְהָא עַמִיק מַכְתָּשָׁא חַוְרָא סַמְקָא בְּקָרָחוּתֵהּ אוֹ בִגְלוֹשׁוּתֵהּ כְּמֶחֱזֵי סְגִירוּתָא מְשַׁךְ בִּסְרָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see him, and behold! the spot of intense [deep] whiteness is tinged with red in his frontal baldness or in his posterior baldness just as the appearance tzoraas [‘confinement’] of the skin of the flesh.

verses.ar_he: גְבַר סְגִיר הוּא מְסָאָב הוּא סָאֳבָא יְסָאֵבִנֵהּ כַּהֲנָא בְּרֵישֵּׁהּ מַכְתָּשֵׁהּ
verses.ar_en: He is a person with tzoraas, [‘confinement’] he is unclean. The kohein shall declare him unclean; his skin-eruption is on his head.

verses.ar_he: וּסְגִירָא דִי בֵהּ מַכְתָּשָׁא לְבוּשׁוֹהִי יְהוֹן מְבַזְעִין וְרֵישֵׁהּ יְהֵי פְרִיעַ וְעַל שָׂפָם כַּאֲבֵלָא יִתְעַטָף וְלָא תִסְתַּאֲבוּן וְלָא תִסְתַּאֲבוּן יִקְרֵי
verses.ar_en: The tzorua [one who is ‘confined’]—[the person] who has the skin-eruption—his garments shall have a tear in them, his hair shall be grown long, and he must cover his head down to his upper lip [like a mourner], and [do not become] Unclean, [do not become] unclean, shall he call out.

verses.ar_he: כָּל יוֹמֵי דִי מַכְתָּשָּׁא בֵהּ יְהֵי מְסָאָב מְסָאָב הוּא בִּלְחוֹדוֹהִי יֵיתֵב מִבָּרָא לְמַשְׁרִיתָא מוֹתְבֵהּ
verses.ar_en: All the days in which the skin-eruption is on him he shall be unclean; he is unclean. He shall dwell alone; his dwelling shall be beyond the encampment.

verses.ar_he: וּלְבוּשָׁא אֲרֵי יְהֵי בֵהּ מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּ בִּלְבֻשׁ עֲמַר אוֹ בִּלְבוּשׁ כִּתָּן
verses.ar_en: When in a garment there is a skin-eruption of tzoraas, [‘confinement’] whether a woolen garment or in a linen garment.

verses.ar_he: אוֹ בְשִׁתְיָא אוֹ בְעַרְבָא לְכִתָּנָא וּלְעַמְרָא אוֹ בְמַשְׁכָּא אוֹ בְּכָל עֲבִידַת מְשָׁךְ
verses.ar_en: Or if it is the warp [lengthwise] threads, or in the woof [widthwise] threads, in a linen garment, or a woolen garment, or on leather or in any object made of leather.

verses.ar_he: וִיהֵי מַכְתָּשָׁא יָרוֹק אוֹ סַמוֹק בִּלְבוּשָׁא אוֹ בְמַשְׁכָּא אוֹ בְשִׁתְיָא אוֹ בְעַרְבָא אוֹ בְכָל מַאן דִמְשַׁךְ מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּתָא הוּא וְיִתַּחֲזֵי לְכַהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: If the plague is deep green or deep red [green or red], in the garment, or in the leather hide or in the warp threads, or in the woof threads, or if it is in any object made of leather; it is the eruption of tzoraas [‘confinement’] and it shall be shown to the kohein.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא וְיַסְגַר יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא שִׁבְעַת יוֹמִין
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see the plague and confine the eruption, for seven days.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא בְּיוֹמָא שְׁבִיעָאָה אֲרֵי אוֹסֵף מַכְתָּשָּׁא בִּלְבוּשָׁא אוֹ בְשִׁתְיָא אוֹ בְעַרְבָא אוֹ בְמַשְׁכָּא לְכֹל דִי יִתְעֲבֵד מַשְׁכָּא לְעִבִידָא סְגִירוּת מְחַסְרָא מַכְתָּשָׁא מְסָאָב הוּא
verses.ar_en: He shall see the eruption on the seventh day. If the eruption has spread [increased] in the garment or in the warp thread, or in the woof thread, or in the leather hide, or in the work made of leather, it is a prickly tzoraas, [‘confinement’ of loss] it is unclean.

verses.ar_he: וְיוֹקִיד יָת לְבוּשָׁא אוֹ יָת שִׁתְיָא אוֹ יָת עַרְבָא בְעַמְרָא אוֹ בְכִתָּנָא אוֹ יָת כָּל מָאן דִמְשַׁךְ דִי יְהֵי בֵהּ מַכְתָּשָׁא אֲרֵי סְגִירוּת מְחַסְרָא הִיא בְּנוּרָא תִּתּוֹקָד
verses.ar_en: He shall burn the garment, or the warp [lengthwise] threads, or the woof [widthwise] threads, be it in wool or in linen, or in all leather made objects, in which there is the eruption. For it is a prickly tzoraas. [‘confinement’ of loss] It shall be burned in fire.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם יֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא וְהָא לָא אוֹסֵף מַכְתָּשָׁא בִּלְבוּשָׁא אוֹ בְשִׁתְיָא אוֹ בְעַרְבָא אוֹ בְּכָל מָאן דִמְשָׁךְ
verses.ar_en: If the kohein will see, and behold! the eruption did not spread [increase] in the garment, or in the warp threads, or in the woof threads, or in any leather made object.

verses.ar_he: וִיפַקֵד כַּהֲנָא וִיחַוְרוּן יָת דִי בֵהּ מַכְתָּשָׁא וְיַסְגְרִנֵהּ שִׁבְעַת יוֹמִין תִּנְיָנוּת
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall command that they shall wash the article having the eruption, and confine it for seven days, a second time.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא בָּתַר דְחַוָרוּ יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא וְהָא לָא שְׁנָא מַכְתָּשָׁא מִן כַּד הֲוָה וּמַכְתָּשָׁא לָא אוֹסֵף מְסָאָב הוּא בְּנוּרָא תּוֹקְדִנֵהּ תַּבְרָא הִיא בִּשְׁחִיקוּתֵהּ אוֹ בחַדָתוּתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall see it after the eruption was washed and behold! [even if] the eruption did not change its hue [from what it was] and the eruption did not spread [increase]; it is unclean, you shall burn it in fire. It is a deep mark [break] be it in a worn [garment] or in a new [garment].

verses.ar_he: וְאִם חֲזָא כַהֲנָא וְהָא עָמְיָא מַכְתָּשָׁא בָּתַר דְחַוָרוּ יָתֵהּ וּבְזַע יָתֵהּ מִן לְבוּשָׁא אוֹ מִן מַשְׁכָּא אוֹ מִן שִׁתְיָא אוֹ מִן עַרְבָא
verses.ar_en: If the kohein saw and behold! the eruption grew faint after it was washed; he shall tear it from the garment, or from the leather, or from the warp threads or from the woof threads.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם תִּתְחֲזֵי עוֹד בִּלְבוּשָׁא אוֹ בְשִׁתְיָא אוֹ בְעַרְבָא אוֹ בְכָל מָאן דִמְשַׁךְ סָגְיָא הִיא בְּנוּרָא תוֹקְדִנֵהּ יָת דִי בֵהּ מַכְתָּשָׁא
verses.ar_en: If it will appear again, in the garment or in the warp [lengthwise] threads, or in the woof [widthwise] threads, or in any leather-made object, it is a recurrent outbreak of tzoraas. You shall burn the article having the eruption in fire.

verses.ar_he: וּלְבוּשָׁא אוֹ שַׁתְיָא אוֹ עַרְבָא אוֹ כָל מָאן דִמְשָׁךְ דִי יִתְחַוַר וְיֶעְדֵי מִנְהוֹן מַכְתָּשָׁא וְיִצְטַּבַּע תִּנְיָנוּת וְיִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: The garment, or the warp threads, or the woof threads, or any leather objects that were washed and the eruption disappears from them, it shall be washed a second time and it shall be purified.

verses.ar_he: דָא אוֹרַיְתָא דְמַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּ בִּלְבוּשׁ עֲמַר אוֹ כִתָּנָא אוֹ שִׁתְיָא אוֹ עַרְבָא אוֹ כָּל מָאן דִמְשָׁךְ לְדַכָּיוּתֵהּ אוֹ לְסַאֲבוּתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: This is the law of the eruption of tzoraas [‘confinement’] be it in a woolen garment, or a linen garment, or in the warp [lengthwise] thread, or in the woof [widthwise] thread, or in any leather-made object, that it be pronounced pure, or that it be pronounced impure.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם מֹשֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying:

verses.ar_he: דָא תְהֵי אוֹרַיְתָא דִסְגִירָא בְּיוֹמָא דְדָכוּתֵהּ וְיִתֵּתֵי לְוָת כַּהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: This shall be the law regarding the person with tzoraas [’confinement’] on the day of his purification, he shall be brought to the kohein.

verses.ar_he: וְיִפּוֹק כַּהֲנָא לְמִבָּרָא לְמַשְׁרִיתָא וְיֶחֱזֵי כַהֲנָא וְהָא אִתַּסִי מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּתָא מִן סְגִירָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall go out beyond the encampment. The kohein shall see; and behold! the skin-eruption of tzoraas [’confinement’] has healed from the person with tzoraas [’confinement’].

verses.ar_he: וִיפַקֵד כַּהֲנָא וְיִסַב לְמִדַכֵּי תַּרְתֵּין צִפֳּרִין חַיִין דָכְיָן וְאָעָא דְאַרְזָא וּצְבַע זְהוֹרִי וְאֵזוֹבָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall command to take for the person undergoing purification two live, pure [kosher] birds, cedar wood, crimson [colored] thread and hyssop.

verses.ar_he: וִיפַקֵד כַּהֲנָא וְיִכּוֹס יָת צִפְּרָא חֲדָא לְמָאן דַחֲסַף עַל מֵי מַבּוּעַ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall command to slaughter the one bird in an earthenware vessel, over running water.

verses.ar_he: יָת צִפְּרָא חַיְתָא יִסַב יָתַהּ וְיָת אָעָא דְאַרְזָא וְיָת צְבַע זְהוֹרִי וְיָת אֵזוֹבָא וְיִטְבּוֹל יָתְהוֹן וְיָת צִפְּרָא חַיְתָא בִּדְמָא דְצִפְּרָא דִנְכִיסָא עַל מֵי מַבּוּעַ
verses.ar_en: [As for] the living bird, he shall take it; and the cedar wood, the crimson [colored] thread and the hyssop and immerse them and the live bird in the blood of the slaughtered bird, over the running water.

verses.ar_he: וְיַדִי עַל דְמִדַכֵּי מִן סְגִירוּתָא שְׁבַע זִמְנִין וִידַכִּנֵהּ וִישַׁלַח יָת צִפְּרָא חַיְתָא עַל אַפֵּי חַקְלָא
verses.ar_en: He shall sprinkle on the person undergoing purification from the tzoraas [’confinement’], seven times and make him pure; and send the live bird into the open field.

verses.ar_he: וִיצַבַּע דְמִדַכֵּי יָת לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וִיגַלַח יָת כָּל שַׂעֲרֵהּ וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וְיִדְכֵּי וּבָתַר כֵּן יֵעוֹל לְמַשְׁרִיתָא וִיתֵב מִבָּרָא לְמַשְׁכְּנֵהּ שִׁבְעַת יוֹמִין
verses.ar_en: The person undergoing purification shall wash his garments, and shave off all of his hair, and bathe in water, and he will become purified. After [this], he may come into the encampment. He must remain, outside of his tent, for seven days.

verses.ar_he: וִיהֵי בְיוֹמָא שְׁבִיעָאָה יְגַלַח יָת כָּל שַׂעֲרֵהּ יָת רֵישֵׁהּ וְיָת דִקְנֵהּ וְיָת גְבִינֵי עֵינוֹהִי וְיָת כָּל שַׂעֲרֵהּ יְגַלָח וִיצַבַּע יָת לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי יָת בִּסְרֵהּ בְּמַיָא וְיִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: It shall be, that on the seventh day, he shall shave off all of his hair, [that of] his head, his beard and his eyebrows; he shall shave off all of his hair. He shall wash his garments, and bathe his body in water and become purified.

verses.ar_he: וּבְיוֹמָא תְמִינָאָה יִסַב תְּרֵין אִמְרִין שַׁלְמִין וְאִמַרְתָּא חֲדָא בַּת שַׁתָּא שְׁלֶמְתָּא וּתְלָתָא עֶסְרוֹנִין סֻלְתָּא מִנְחָתָא דְפִילָא בִמְשַׁח וְלֻגָא חַד דְמִשְׁחָא
verses.ar_en: On the eighth day, he shall take two unblemished lambs and one ewe in her first year, unblemished, and three tenths fine flour, for a meal-offering, mixed with oil and one log of oil.

verses.ar_he: וִיקִים כַּהֲנָא דִמְדַכֵּי יָת גַבְרָא דְמִדַכֵּי וְיָתְהוֹן קֳדָם יְיָ בִּתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein doing the purification, shall place the man undergoing the purification and the [aforementioned] items, before Adonoy, at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב כַּהֲנָא יָת אִמְרָא חֲדָא וִיקָרֵב יָתֵיהּ לַאֲשָּׁמָא וְיָת לֻגָא דְמִשְׁחָא וִירִים יָתְהוֹן אֲרָמָא קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall take one lamb and bring it as a guilt-offering, and (with) the log of oil and wave [lift] them [up] as a wave-offering [an uplifted offering] before Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וְיִכּוֹס יָת אִמְרָא בַּאֲתַר דִי יִכּוֹס יָת חַטָאתָא וְיָת עֲלָתָא בַּאֲתַר קַדִישׁ אֲרֵי כְּחַטָאתָא אֲשָׁמָא הוּא לְכַהֲנָא קֹדֶשׁ קוּדְשִׁין הוּא
verses.ar_en: He shall slaughter the lamb in the place where he slaughters the sin-offering and the burnt-offering, in the sacred place; for, just as the sin-offering—is the guilt-offering; it belongs to the kohein, it is most holy.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב כַּהֲנָא מִדְמָא דַאֲשָׁמָא וְיִתֵּן כַּהֲנָא עַל רוּם אוּדְנָא דְמִדַכֵּי דְיַמִינָא וְעַל אִלְיוֹן יְדֵהּ דְיַמִינָא וְעַל אִלְיוֹן רַגְלֵהּ דְיַמִינָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall take from the blood of the guilt-offering and the kohein shall put it on the middle ridge [upper part] of the right ear of the person being purified, and on the thumb of his right hand and on the big toe of his right foot.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב כַּהֲנָא מִלֻגָא דְמִשְׁחָא וִירִיק עַל יְדָא דְכַהֲנָא דִשְׁמָאלָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall take from the log of the oil and he shall pour it onto the koheins left palm.

verses.ar_he: וְיִטְבּוֹל כַּהֲנָא יָת אֶצְבְּעֵהּ דְיַמִינָא מִן מִשְׁחָא דִי עַל יְדֵהּ דִּשְׂמָאלָא וְיַדִי מִן מִשְׁחָא בְּאֶצְבְּעֵהּ שְׁבַע זִמְנִין קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall immerse his right finger in some of the oil that is on his left palm and he shall sprinkle some of the oil with his finger seven times before Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וּמִשְׁאָר מִשְׁחָא דִי עַל יְדֵהּ יִתֵּן כַּהֲנָא עַל רוּם אוּדְנָא דְמִדַכֵּי דְיַּמִינָא וְעַל אִלְיוֹן יְדֵהּ דְיַמִינָא וְעַל אִלְיוֹן רַגְלֵהּ דְיַמִינָא עַל דְמָא דַאֲשָׁמָא
verses.ar_en: From the remaining oil that is on his palm, the kohein shall put on the middle ridge [upper part] of the right ear of the person being purified, and on the thumb of his right hand, and on the big toe of his right foot; on [over] the blood of the guilt-offering.

verses.ar_he: וּדְאִשְׁתָּאַר בְּמִשְׁחָא דִי עַל יְדָא דְכַהֲנָא יִתֵּן עַל רֵישָׁא דְמִדַכֵּי וִיכַפֵּר עֲלוֹהִי כַּהֲנָא קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: Whatever oil remains that is on the palm of the kohein, he shall put on the head of the person undergoing purification. The kohein will atone for him before Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וְיַעְבֵּד כַּהֲנָא יָת חַטָאתָא וִיכַפֵּר עַל דְמִדַּכֵּי מִסּוֹבְתֵהּ וּבָתַר כֵּן יִכּוֹס יָת עֲלָתָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall do (offer) the sin-offering and atone for the person undergoing purification from his impurity and afterwards he shall slaughter the burnt-offering.

verses.ar_he: וְיַסֵק כַּהֲנָא יָת עֲלָתָא וְיָת מִנְחָתָא לְמַדְבְּחָא וִיכַפֵּר עֲלוֹהִי כַּהֲנָא וְיִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall raise up the burnt-offering and the meal-offering onto the altar and the kohein will atone for him and he will be purified.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם מִסְכֵּן הוּא וְלֵית יְדֵהּ מַדְבְּקָא וְיִסַּב אִמַר חַד אֲשָׁמָא לַאֲרָמָא לְכַפָּרָא עֲלוֹהִי וְעִסְרוֹנָא סֻלְתָּא חַד דְפִיל בִּמְשַּׁח לְמִנְחָא וְלֻגָא דְמִשְׁחָא
verses.ar_en: If he is poor and his means are not sufficient, he shall take one lamb as a guilt-offering, for a wave-offering [an uplifted offering] to atone for him and one tenth fine flour mixed with oil, as a meal-offering and a log of oil.

verses.ar_he: וְתַרְתֵּין שַּׁפְנִינִין אוֹ תְרֵין בְּנֵי יוֹנָה דִי תַדְבֵּק יְדֵהּ וִיהֵי חַד חַטָאתָא וְחַד עֲלָתָא
verses.ar_en: And two turtledoves or two young pigeons such as his means suffice. One shall be for a sin-offering and one shall be for a burnt-offering.

verses.ar_he: וְיַיְתִי יָתְהוֹן בְּיוֹמָא תְמִינָאָה לְדַכָּיוּתֵהּ לְוָת כַּהֲנָא לִתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: He shall bring them on the eighth day of his purification, to the kohein, to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting, before Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב כַּהֲנָא יָת אִמְרָא דַאֲשָׁמָא וְיָת לֻגָא דְמִשְׁחָא וִירִים יָתְהוֹן כַּהֲנָא אֲרָמָא קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall take the guilt-offering sheep and the log of oil and the kohein shall wave [lift] them [up] as a wave-offering [an uplifted offering] before Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וְיִכּוֹס יָת אִמְרָא דַאֲשָׁמָא וְיִסַב כַּהֲנָא מִדְמָא דַאֲשָׁמָא וְיִתֵּן עַל רוּם אוּדְנָא דְמִדַכֵּי דְיַמִינָא וְעַל אִלְיוֹן יְדֵהּ דְיַמִינָא וְעַל אִלְיוֹן רַגְלֵהּ דְיַמִינָא
verses.ar_en: He shall slaughter the guilt-offering lamb. The kohein shall take some blood of the guilt-offering and put it on the middle ridge [upper part] of the right ear of the person undergoing purification, and on the thumb of his right hand and the big toe of his right foot.

verses.ar_he: וּמִן מִשְׁחָא יְרִיק כַּהֲנָא עַל יְדָא דְכַהֲנָא דִשְׂמָאלָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall pour some of the oil onto the koheins left palm.

verses.ar_he: וְיַדִי כַהֲנָא בְּאֶצְבְּעֵהּ דְיַמִינָא מִן מִשְׁחָא דִי עַל יְדֵהּ דִשְׂמָאלָא שְׁבַע זִמְנִין קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall sprinkle, with his right finger, some of the oil that is on his left palm, seven times before Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וְיִתֵּן כַּהֲנָא מִן מִשְׁחָא דִי עַל יְדֵהּ עַל רוּם אוּדְנָא דְמִדַכֵּי דְיַמִינָא וְעַל אִלְיוֹן יְדֵהּ דְיַמִינָא וְעַל אִלְיוֹן רַגְלֵהּ דְיַמִינָא עַל אֲתַר דְמָא דַאֲשָׁמָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall put some of the oil that is on his palm, on the middle ridge [upper part] of the right ear of the person undergoing purification, and on the thumb of his right hand and on the big toe of his right foot, on the place of the blood of the guilt-offering.

verses.ar_he: וּדְיִשְׁתָּאַר מִן מִשְׁחָא דִי עַל יְדָא דְכַהֲנָא יִתֵּן עַל רֵישָׁא דְמִדַכֵּי לְכַפָּרָא עֲלוֹהִי קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: What remains of the oil that is on the palm of the kohein, he shall put on the head of the person undergoing purification, to achieve his atonement before Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וְיַעְבֵּד יָת חַד מִן שַׁפְנִינַיָא אוֹ מִן בְּנֵי יוֹנָה מִדִי תַדְבֵּק יְדֵהּ
verses.ar_en: He shall do (offer) one of the turtledoves or of the young pigeons, from that which his means suffice,

verses.ar_he: יָת דִי תַדְבֵּק יְדֵהּ יָת חַד חַטָאתָא וְיָת חַד עֲלָתָא עַל מִנְחָתָא וִיכַפֵר כַּהֲנָא עַל דְמִדַכֵּי קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: that for which his means are sufficient, one for a sin-offering, and the other for a burnt-offering with the meal-offering. The kohein will atone for the person undergoing purification before Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: דָא אוֹרַיְתָא דִי בֵהּ מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּ דִי לָא תַדְבֵּק יְדֵהּ בְּדָכוּתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: This is the law of whoever has the skin-eruption of tzoraas [’confinement’] whose means are not sufficient in his purification.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם מֹשֶׁה וְעִם אַהֲרֹן לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe and to Aharon, saying:

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי תֵעֲלוּן לְאַרְעָא דִכְנַעַן דִי אֲנָא יָהֵב לְכוֹן לְאַחֲסָנָא וְאֶתֵּן מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּ בְּבֵית אַרְעָא אַחֲסַנְתְּכוֹן
verses.ar_en: When you will come into the land of Canaan that I will give to you for a possession, and I shall put the eruption of tzoraas [’confinement’] in the house of the land of your possession.

verses.ar_he: וְיֵיתֵי דִי דִילֵהּ בֵּיתָא וִיחַוִי לְכַהֲנָא לְמֵימָר כְּמַכְתָּשָׁא אִתְחֲזִי לִי בְּבֵיתָא
verses.ar_en: Whoevers house it is, shall come and tell to the kohein, saying, Something like an eruption has appeared to me in the house.

verses.ar_he: וִיפַקֵד כַּהֲנָא וִיפַנוּן יָת בֵּיתָא עַד לָא יֵעוֹל כַּהֲנָא לְמֶחֱזֵי יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא וְלָא יִסְתָּאַב כָּל דִי בְּבֵיתָא וּבָתַר כֵּן יֵיעוֹל כַּהֲנָא לְמֶחֱזֵי יָת בֵּיתָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall command, and they shall empty the house [of its contents] before the kohein will come to see the eruption so everything in the house shall not become impure. Afterwards, the kohein shall come to see the house.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶחֱזֵי יָת מַכְתָּשָׁא וְהָא מַכְתָּשָׁא בְּכָתְלֵי בֵיתָא פַּחֲתִין יַרְקָן אוֹ סַמְקָן וּמֶחֱזֵיהוֹן מַכִּיךְ מִן כָּתְלָא
verses.ar_en: He shall see the eruption and behold! The eruption is in the walls of the house; impressions, of greenest green or of reddest red [green or red] and they appear to be lower than the [surface of] the wall.

verses.ar_he: וְיִפּוֹק כַּהֲנָא מִן בֵּיתָא לִתְרַע בֵּיתָא וְיַסְגַר יָת בֵּיתָא שִׁבְעָא יוֹמִין
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall go out of the house to the entrance of the house, and place the house under quarantine for seven days.

verses.ar_he: וִיתוּב כַּהֲנָא בְּיוֹמָא שְׁבִיעָאָה וְיֶחֱזֵי וְהָא אוֹסֵף מַכְתָּשָׁא בּכָתְלֵי בֵיתָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall return on the seventh day and shall see; and behold! the eruption has spread [increased] in the walls of the house.

verses.ar_he: וִיפַקֵד כֲּהֲנָא וִישַׁלְפוּן יָת אַבְנַיָא דִי בְהוֹן מַכְתָּשָׁא וְיִרְמוּן יָתְהוֹן לְמִבָּרָא לְקַרְתָּא לַאַתַר מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall command and they shall remove the stones in which there is the eruption and cast them away, beyond the city to an impure place.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת בֵּיתָא יְקַלְפוּן מִגָיו סְחוֹר סְחוֹר וְיִרְמוּן יָת עַפְרָא דִי קַלִיפוּ לְמִבָּרָא לְקַרְתָּא לַאֲתַר מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: He shall scrape the house from the inside, all around, and they shall throw away the earth that they scraped, beyond the city, to an impure place.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסְבוּן אַבְנַיָא אָחֳרָנִין וְיַיְתוּן בַּאֲתַר אַבְנַיָא וַעֲפַר אָחֳרָן יִסַב וִישׁוּעַ יָת בֵּיתָא
verses.ar_en: They shall take other stones, and they shall bring them to replace the stones, and he shall take other earth and plaster the house.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם יְתוּב מַכְתָּשָׁא וְיִסְגֵי בְּבֵיתָא בָּתַר דְשַׁלִיפוּ יָת אַבְנַיָא וּבָתַר דְקַלִיפוּ יָת בֵּיתָא וּבָתַּר דְאִתְּשָׁע
verses.ar_en: If the eruption returns and sprouts in the house after the stones were removed, and after the house was scraped, and after it was plastered,

verses.ar_he: וְיֵיעוֹל כַּהֲנָא וְיֶחֱזֵי וְהָא אוֹסֵף מַכְתָּשָׁא בְּבֵיתָא סְגִירוּת מְחַסְרָא הִיא בְּבֵיתָא מְסָאָב הוּא
verses.ar_en: the kohein shall come and see; and behold! the eruption has spread [increased] in the house; prickly tzoraas [’confinement’ of loss] is in the house, it is impure.

verses.ar_he: וִיתָרַע יָת בֵּיתָא יָת אַבְנוֹהִי וְיָת אָעוֹהִי וְיָת כָּל עֲפַר בֵּיתָא וְיַפֵּק לְמִבָּרָא לְקַרְתָּא לַאֲתַר מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: He shall dismantle the house; its stones and its wood and all the earth of the house. He shall take it out beyond the city, to an impure place.

verses.ar_he: וּדְיֵיעוֹל לְבֵיתָא כָּל יוֹמִין דְיַסְגַר יָתֵהּ יְהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Whoever will come inside the house [during] all the days of its confinement, shall be impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וּדְיִשְׁכּוּב בְּבֵיתָא יְצַבַּע יָת לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וּדְיֵיכוּל בְּבֵיתָא יְצַבַּע יָת לְבוּשׁוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: Whoever will lie down inside the house shall wash his garments. Whoever will eat inside the house shall wash his garments.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם מֵעַל יֵיעוֹל כַּהֲנָא וְיֶחֱזֵי וְהָא לָא אוֹסֵף מַכְתָּשָׁא בְּבֵיתָא בָּתַר דְאִתְּשַׁע יָת בֵּיתָא וידַכֵּי כַהֲנָא יָת בֵּיתָא אֲרֵי אִתַּסִי מַכְתָּשָׁא
verses.ar_en: If the kohein shall come and see; and behold! the eruption did not spread [increase] in the house after the house was plastered, the kohein shall pronounce the house [to be] pure, for the eruption has been healed.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב לְדַכָּאָה יָת בֵּיתָא תַּרְתֵּין צִפֲּרִין וְאָעָא דְאַרְזָא וּצְבַע זְהוֹרִי וְאֵזוֹבָא
verses.ar_en: He shall take, to purify the house, two birds, cedar wood, crimson [colored] thread and hyssop.

verses.ar_he: וְיִכּוֹס יָת צִפֲּרָא חֲדָא לְמַאן דַחֲסַף עַל מֵי מַבּוּעַ
verses.ar_en: He shall slaughter one bird in an earthenware vessel, over running water.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב יָת אָעָא דְאַרְזָא וְיָת אֵזוֹבָא וְיָת צְבַע זְהוֹרִי וְיָת צִפֲּרָא חַיְתָא וְיִטְבּוֹל יָתְהוֹן בִּדְמָא דְצִפֲּרָא דִנְכִיסָא וּבְמֵי מַבּוּעַ וְיַדִי לְבֵיתָא שְׁבַע זִמְנִין
verses.ar_en: He shall take the cedar wood, the hyssop, the crimson [colored] thread and the live bird and immerse them in the blood of the slaughtered bird and in the running water, and sprinkle the house seven times.

verses.ar_he: וִידַכֵּי יָת בֵּיתָא בִּדְמָא דְצִפֲּרָא וּבְמֵי מַבּוּעַ וּבְצִפֲּרָא חַיְתָא וּבְאָעָא דְאַרְזָא וּבְאֵזוֹבָא וּבִצְבַע זְהוֹרִי
verses.ar_en: He shall purify the house with the blood of the bird, and with the running water, and with the live bird, the cedar wood, the hyssop and the crimson [colored] thread.

verses.ar_he: וִישַׁלַח יָת צִפֲּרָא חַיְתָא לְמִבָּרָא לְקַרְתָּא לְאַפֵּי חַקְלָא וִיכַפֵּר עַל בֵּיתָא וְיִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: He shall send the living bird, beyond the city into the open field, and atone for the house and it shall be purified.

verses.ar_he: דָא אוֹרַיְתָא לְכָל מַכְתַּשׁ סְגִירוּתָא וּלְנִתְקָא
verses.ar_en: This is the law for all the eruptions of tzoraas [’confinement’] and for the nesek.

verses.ar_he: וְלִסְגִירוּת לְבוּשָׁא וּלְבֵיתָא
verses.ar_en: For tzoraas [’confinement’] of the garment and of the house.

verses.ar_he: וּלְעַמְקָא וּלְעַדְיָא וּלְבַהֲרָא
verses.ar_en: For the spot [deeply] white as wool, for the spot that is nearly as white and for the spot white as snow.

verses.ar_he: לְאַלָפָא בְּיוֹמָא מְסָאָבָא וּבְיוֹמָא דַכְיָא דָא אוֹרַיְתָא דִסְגִירוּתָא
verses.ar_en: To teach [the law] of the day of becoming impure and of the day of becoming pure; this is the law of tzoraas [’confinement’].

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם מֹשֶׁה וְעִם אַהֲרֹן לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe and to Aharon, saying:

verses.ar_he: מַלִילוּ עִם בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְתֵימְרוּן לְהוֹן גְבַר גְבַר אֲרֵי יְהֵי דָאִיב מִבִּשְׂרֵהּ דוֹבֵהּ מְסָאָב הוּא
verses.ar_en: Speak to Bnei Yisroel and say to them; should [discharge] flow from the body of any man, [because of] his discharge, he is impure.

verses.ar_he: וְדָא תְּהֵי סוֹבְתֵהּ בְּדוֹבֵהּ רָר בִּשְׂרֵהּ יָת דוֹבֵהּ אוֹ חָתִים בִּשְׂרֵהּ מִדוֹבֵהּ סוֹבְתֵהּ הִיא
verses.ar_en: This is the law of his impurity, when his discharge flows; His flesh drips [with] his discharge or his flesh is stopped up by his discharge, it causes him to become impure.

verses.ar_he: כָּל מִשְׁכְּבָא דִי יִשְׁכּוּב עֲלוֹהִי דוֹבָנָא יְהֵי מְסָאָב וְכָל מָנָא דְיֵיתֵב עֲלוֹהִי יהֵי מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: Every bed [Anything that is used specifically for sleeping], upon which will lie a zov [a person from whom a discharge flows,] shall become impure. Every vessel upon which he sits, shall become impure.

verses.ar_he: וּגְבַר דִי יִקְרַב בְּמִשְׁכְּבֵהּ יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: A person who touches his bed shall wash his garments and bathe in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וּדְיֵיתֵב עַל מָנָא דְיֵיתֵב עֲלוֹהִי דוֹבָנָא יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Whoever sits on the vessel that was sat upon by a zov shall wash his garments and bathe in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וּדְיִקְרַב בִּבְסַר דוֹבָנָא יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Whoever touches the flesh of a zov shall wash his garments and bathe in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲרֵי יֵרוֹק דוֹבָנָא בְּדַכְיָא וִיצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָּׁא
verses.ar_en: If the zov spits on a ritually clean person, he shall wash his garments and bathe in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל מֶרְכְּבָא דִי יִרְכּוּב עֲלוֹהִי דוֹבָנָא יְהֵי מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: Anything that is used for riding upon which a zov will ride shall become impure.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל דְיִקְרַב בְּכֹל דִי יְהֵי תְחוֹתוֹהִי יְהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא וּדְיִטוֹל יָתְהוֹן יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Anyone who touches anything which is beneath him shall be impure until the evening. and whoever carries them shall wash his garments and bathe in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְכֹל דִי יִקְרַב בֵּהּ דוֹבָנָא וִידוֹהִי לָא שְׁטַף בְּמַיָא וִיצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: If a zov touches anyone and his hands were not rinsed in water, he shall wash his garments and bathe in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וּמָאן דַחֲסַף דִי יִקְרַב בֵּהּ דוֹבָנָא יִתָּבָר וְכָל מָאן דְאָע יִשְׁתַּטַּף בְּמַיָא
verses.ar_en: An earthenware vessel which the zov will touch shall be broken. Any wooden vessel shall be rinsed in water.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲרֵי יִדְכֵּי דוֹבָנָא מִדוֹבֵהּ וְיִמְנֵי לֵהּ שִׁבְעַת יוֹמִין לְדָכוּתֵהּ וִיצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בִשְׂרֵהּ בְּמֵי מַבּוּעַ וְיִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: When a zov will become ritually clean, from his discharge-impurity, he shall count for himself seven days for his purification and wash his garments, and bathe in running water, and he will be purified.

verses.ar_he: וּבְיוֹמָא תְמִינָאָה יִסַב לֵהּ תַּרְתֵּין שַׁפְנִינִין אוֹ תְרֵין בְּנֵי יוֹנָה וְיֵיתֵי לָקֳדָם יְיָ לִתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא וְיִתְּנִנוּן לְכַהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: On the eighth day he shall take for himself two turtledoves or two young pigeons and come before Adonoy, to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting and give them to the kohein.

verses.ar_he: וְיַעְבֵּד יָתְהוֹן כַּהֲנָא חָד חַטָאתָא וְחָד עֲלָתָא וִיכַפֵּר עֲלוֹהִי כַהֲנָא קֳדָם יְיָ מִדוֹבֵהּ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall do (offer) them, one as a sin-offering and the [other] one as a burnt-offering. The kohein will atone for him before Adonoy, from his discharge-impurity.

verses.ar_he: וּגְבַר אֲרֵי תִפוֹק מִנֵהּ שִׁכְבַת זַרְעָא וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא יָת כָּל בִּשְׂרֵהּ וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: A man, if semen issues from him, he shall bathe his entire body in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל לְבוּשׁ וְכָל מְשַׁךְ דִי יְהֵי עֲלוֹהִי שִׁכְבַת זַרְעָא וְיִצְטַבַּע בְּמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Any garment and any leather object upon which there is semen shall be washed in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְאִתְּתָא דִי יִשְׁכּוּב גְבַר יָתָהּ שִׁכְבַת זַרְעָא וְיַסְחוּן בְּמַיָא וְיִסְאֲבוּן עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: A woman, with whom a man will lie conjugally; they shall bathe in water, and are impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְאִתְּתָא אֲרֵי תְהֵי דָיְבָא דָם יְהֵי דוֹבָהּ בְּבִשְׂרָהּ שִׁבְעָא יוֹמִין תְּהֵי בְרִחוּקָהּ וְכָל דְיִקְרַב בָּהּ יְהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: When a woman has a discharge [and] the discharge will be blood in her body, for seven days she will be in [the state of] her menstrual impurity [’separation’]. Anyone who touches her will be impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְכֹל דִי תִשְׁכּוּב עֲלוֹהִי בְּרִחוּקָהּ יְהֵי מְסָאָב וְכֹל דִי תֵיתֵב עֲלוֹהִי יְהֵי מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: Everything that she sleeps on, during her menstrual impurity [’separation’], will become impure and everything that she sits on will be impure.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל דְיִקְרַב בְּמִשְׁכְּבָהּ יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Anyone who touches what she slept on, shall wash his garments and bathe in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל דְיִקְרַב בְּכָל מָנָא דִי תֵיתֵב עֲלוֹהִי יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Anyone who touches any vessel that she sits on, shall wash his garments and bathe in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם עַל מִשְׁכְּבָא הוּא אוֹ עַל מָנָא דִי הִיא יָתְבָא עֲלוֹהִי בְּמִקְרְבֵהּ בֵּהּ יְהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: If he is on the bed or on the vessel that she is sitting on, when he touches it, he shall be impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם מִשְׁכַּב יִשְׁכּוּב גְבַר יָתָהּ וּתְהֵי רִחוּקָהּ עֲלוֹהִי וִיהֵי מְסָאָב שִׁבְעַת יוֹמִין וְכָל מִשְׁכָּב דִי יִשְׁכּוּב עֲלוֹהִי יְהֵי מְסָאָב
verses.ar_en: If a man will lie conjugally with her, her menstrual impurity [’separation’] will be on him and he is impure for seven days. Anything used for sleeping—if he should sleep on it—it will be impure.

verses.ar_he: וְאִתְּתָא אֲרֵי יְדוּב דוֹב דְמָהּ יוֹמִין סַגִיאִין בְּלָא עִדַן רִחוּקָהּ אוֹ אֲרֵי תְדוּב עַל רִחוּקָהּ כָּל יוֹמֵי דוֹב סוֹבְתָהּ כְּיוֹמֵי רִחוּקָהּ תְּהֵי מְסָאֳבָא הִיא
verses.ar_en: When a woman discharges her blood-flow, many days outside her menstrual cycle [period of ‘separation’], or if it flows after her menstrual cycle [’separation’], all the days of her discharge-impurity shall be as her days of menstrual impurity [’separation’]; she is impure.

verses.ar_he: כָּל מִשְׁכְּבָא דִי תִשְׁכּוּב עֲלוֹהִי כָּל יוֹמֵי דוֹבָהּ כְּמִשְׁכַּב רִחוּקָהּ יְהֵי לָהּ וְכָל מָנָא דִי תֵתֵב עֲלוֹהִי מְסָאָב יְהֵי כְּסוֹאֲבַת רִחוּקָהּ
verses.ar_en: Anything used for sleeping upon which she will lie [on] any of her discharge-impurity-days, as the bed of her menstrual impurity [’separation’] it shall be to her. Every vessel upon which she sits will be impure, just as [is] her menstrual-impurity [the impurity of her ‘separation’].

verses.ar_he: וְכָל דְיִקְרַב בְּהוֹן יְהֵי מְסָאָב וִיצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Anyone that touches them will be impure and he shall wash his garments and bathe in water and is impure until the evening.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם דְכִיאַת מִדוֹבָהּ וְתִמְנֵי לָהּ שִׁבְעַת יוֹמִין וּבָתַר כֵּן תִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: When she has become pure from her discharge-impurity, she shall count seven days for herself and afterwards she becomes purified.

verses.ar_he: וּבְיוֹמָא תְמִינָאָה תִּסַב לָהּ תַּרְתֵּין שַׁפְנִינִין אוֹ תְרֵין בְּנֵי יוֹנָה וְתַיְתִי יָתְהוֹן לְוָת כַּהֲנָא לִתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: On the eighth day she shall take for herself, two turtledoves or two young pigeons and she shall bring them to the kohein, to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וְיַעְבֵּד כַּהֲנָא יָת חָד חַטָאתָא וְיָת חָד עֲלָתָא וִיכַפֵּר עֲלָהּ כַּהֲנָא קֳדָם יְיָ מִדוֹב סוֹבְתָהּ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall do (offer) one as a sin-offering and the [other] one as a burnt-offering. The kohein will atone for her before Adonoy from her discharge-impurity.

verses.ar_he: וְתַפְרְשׁוּן יָת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל מִסוֹאֲבַתְהוֹן וְלָא יְמוּתוּן בְּסוֹאֲבַתְהוֹן בְּסָאָבְהוֹן יָת מַשְׁכְּנִי דִי בֵינֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: You shall separate Bnei Yisroel from their impurities and they will not die because of their impurities through their defilement of My dwelling in their midst.

verses.ar_he: דָא אוֹרַיְתָא דְדוֹבָנָא וְדִי תִפּוֹק מִנֵהּ שִּׁכְבַת זַרְעָא לְאִסְתָּאָבָא בָהּ
verses.ar_en: This is the law of the zov and of him from whom semen issues to become impure through it.

verses.ar_he: וְלִדְסוֹבְתָה בְּרִחוּקָהּ וְלִדְדָאִיב יָת דוֹבֵהּ לִדְכַר וּלְנֻקְבָא וְלִגְבַר דִי יִשְׁכּוּב עִם מְסָאָבָא
verses.ar_en: For the menstruant [woman who is impure] during her period of separation and for one who has a discharge for a male and for a female; and for the man that will lie conjugally with an impure woman.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלֵיל יְיָ עִם מֹשֶׁה בָּתַר דְמִיתוּ תְּרֵין בְּנֵי אַהֲרֹן בְּקָרוֹבֵיהוֹן אֶשָׁתָא נוּכְרֵיתָא קֳדָם יְיָ וּמִיתוּ
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy spoke to Moshe after the death of two sons of Aharon, who brought an [unauthorized] offering [strange fire] before Adonoy and they died.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר יְיָ לְמֹשֶׁה מַלֵל עִם אַהֲרֹן אָחוּךְ וְלָא יְהֵי עָלֵל בְּכָל עִדָן לְקוּדְשָׁא מִגָיו לְפָרֻכְתָּא לָקֳדָם כַּפֻּרְתָּא דִי עַל אֲרוֹנָא וְלָא יְמוּת אֲרֵי בַּעֲנָנָא אֲנָא מִתְגְלִי עַל בֵּית כַּפֻּרְתָּא
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe: Speak to your brother Aharon that he not come at all times into the Holy [Sanctuary] that is inside of the Curtain, before the Ark-cover that is on the Ark so that he not die, for in a cloud I shall appear [become revealed] on the [House of the] Ark-cover.

verses.ar_he: בְּדָא יְהֵי עָלֵל אַהֲרֹן לְקוּדְשָׁא בְּתוֹר בַּר תּוֹרֵי לְחַטָּאתָא וּדְכַר לַעֲלָתָא
verses.ar_en: With this shall Aharon come into the Holy [Sanctuary]; with a young bullock, for a sin-offering and a ram, for a burnt-offering.

verses.ar_he: כִּתּוּנָא דְבוּצָא קוּדְשָׁא יִלְבָּשׁ וּמִכְנְסִין דְבוּץ יְהוֹן עַל בִּסְרֵהּ וּבְהֶמְיָנָא דְבוּץ יֵסַר וּבְמִצְנֶפְתָּא דְבוּצָא יָחֵת בְּרֵישֵׁהּ לְבוּשֵׁי קוּדְשָׁא אִנוּן וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא יָת בִּסְרֵהּ וְיַלְבְּשִׁנוּן
verses.ar_en: He shall don a sanctified, linen tunic and linen pants shall be on his body. He shall gird himself with a linen sash and place a linen turban on his head. These are sacred garments; he shall bathe his body in water and clothe himself in them.

verses.ar_he: וּמִן כְּנִשְׁתָּא דִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל יִסַב תְּרֵין צְפִירֵי עִזִין לְחַטָאתָא וּדְכַר חַד לַעֲלָתָא
verses.ar_en: He shall take, from the congregation of Israel two he-goats for sin-offerings and one ram for a burnt-offering.

verses.ar_he: וִיקָרֵב אַהֲרֹן יָת תּוֹרָא דְחַטָּאתָא דִי לֵהּ וִיכַפֵּר עֲלוֹהִי וְעַל אֱנַשׁ בֵּיתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Aharon shall bring the sin-offering bullock which is his and atone on his own behalf and on behalf of his household.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב יָת תְּרֵין צְפִירִין וִיקִים יָתְהוֹן קֳדָם יְיָ בִּתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: He shall take the two he-goats and stand them before Adonoy, at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וְיִתֵּן אַהֲרֹן עַל תְּרֵין צְפִירִין עַדְבִין עַדְבָא חַד לִשְׁמָא דַיְיָ וְעַדְבָא חַד לַעֲזָאזֵל
verses.ar_en: Aharon shall put lots on the two he-goats; one lot [marked] for [the Name of] Adonoy and one lot [marked] for Azazel.

verses.ar_he: וִיקָרֵב אַהֲרֹן יָת צְפִירָא דִי סְלִיק עֲלוֹהִי עַדְבָא לִשְׁמָא דַיְיָ וְיַעְבְּדִנֵהּ חַטָאתָא
verses.ar_en: Aharon shall bring the goat upon which the lot [marked] for [the Name of] Adonoy came up and do (offer) it as a sin-offering.

verses.ar_he: וּצְפִירָא דִי סְלִיק עֲלוֹהִי עַדְבָא לַעֲזָאזֵל יִתָּקַם כַּד חַי קֳדָם יְיָ לְכַפָּרָא עֲלוֹהִי לְשַׁלַח יָתֵהּ לַעֲזָאזֵל לְמַדְבְּרָא
verses.ar_en: The goat upon which came up the lot [marked] for Azazel shall be placed, alive, before Adonoy, to achieve atonement with it to send it to Azazel, in the desert.

verses.ar_he: וִיקָרֵב אַהֲרֹן יָת תּוֹרָא דְחַטָאתָא דִי לֵהּ וִיכַפֵּר עֲלוֹהִי וְעַל אֱנַשׁ בֵּיתֵהּ וְיִכּוֹס יָת תּוֹרָא דְחַטָאתָא דִי לֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Aharon shall bring the sin-offering-bullock which is his and atone on his behalf and on behalf of his household, and he shall slaughter his sin-offering-bullock.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב מְלֵי מַחְתִּיתָא גוּמְרִין דְאֶשָׁא מֵעִלַוֵי מַדְבְּחָא מִן קֳדָם יְיָ וּמְלֵי חָפְנוֹהִי קְטוֹרֶת בּוּסְמִין דַקִיקִין וְיָעֵל מִגָיו לְפָרֻכְתָּא
verses.ar_en: He shall take a full hand-shovel of fiery coals from atop the altar, which is before Adonoy and full handfuls of finely-ground incense and he shall bring [them] inside of the curtain.

verses.ar_he: וְיִתֵּן יָת קְטוֹרֶת בּוּסְמַיָא עַל אֶשָׁתָא לָקֳדָם יְיָ וְחָפֵי עֲנָנָא קְטָרְתָּא יָת כַּפֻּרְתָּא דִי עַל סַהֲדוּתָא וְלָא יְמוּת
verses.ar_en: He shall put the incense [spices] on the fire before Adonoy and the cloud of incense will cover the Ark-cover that is on the [tablets of] Testimony, that he not die.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב מִדְמָא דְתוֹרָא וְיַדֵי בְאֶצְבְּעֵהּ עַל אַפֵּי כַּפּוּרְתָּא קִדוּמָא וְלָקֳדָם כַּפֻּרְתָּא יַדִי שְׁבַע זִמְנִין מִן דְמָא בְּאֶצְבְּעֵהּ
verses.ar_en: He shall take some of the bullocks blood and he shall sprinkle with his finger, above the surface of the Ark-cover on its eastern part; and before the Ark-cover, he shall sprinkle, some blood, with his finger, seven times.

verses.ar_he: וְיִכּוֹס יָת צְפִירָא דְחַטָאתָא דִי לְעַמָא וְיָעֵל יָת דְמֵהּ לְמִגָיו לְפָרֻכְתָּא וְיַעְבֵּד לִדְמֵהּ כְּמָא דִי עֲבַּד לִדְמָא דְתוֹרָא וְיַדִי יָתֵהּ עַל כַּפֻּרְתָּא וְלָקֳדָם כַּפֻּרְתָּא
verses.ar_en: He shall slaughter the he-goat sin-offering that belongs to the people, and he shall bring its blood inside of the Curtain. He shall do [with] its blood just as he did with the bullocks blood and he shall sprinkle it on the Ark-cover and before of the Ark-cover.

verses.ar_he: וִיכַפֵּר עַל קוּדְשָׁא מִסוֹאֲבַת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וּמִמֶרְדֵיהוֹן לְכָל חֲטָאֵיהוֹן וְכֵן יַעְבֵּד לְמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא דְשָׁרֵי עִמְהוֹן בְּגוֹ סוֹאֲבָתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: He will atone for the Sanctuary, from the impurities of Bnei Yisroel and from their rebellious sins for all their transgressions. He shall do likewise for the Tent of Meeting, that dwells with them in the midst of their impurity.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל אֱנַשׁ לָא יְהֵי בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא בְּמֵעֲלֵהּ לְכַפָּרָא בְקוּדְשָׁא עַד מִפְּקֵהּ וִיכַפֵּר עֲלוֹהִי וְעַל אֱנַשׁ בֵּיתֵהּ וְעַל כָּל קְהָלָא דְיִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: No man shall be present in the Tent of Meeting when he comes in to atone for the Holy [Sanctuary] until he leaves. He shall atone on his behalf and on behalf of his household and on behalf of the entire assembly of Israel.

verses.ar_he: וְיִפּוֹק לְמַדְבְּחָא דִי קֳדָם יְיָ וִיכַפֵּר עֲלוֹהִי וְיִסַב מִדְמָא דְתוֹרָא וּמִדְמָא דִצְפִירָא וְיִתֵּן עַל קַרְנַת מַדְבְּחָא סְחוֹר סְחוֹר
verses.ar_en: He shall go out to the altar that is before Adonoy and atone on it. He shall take some of the bullocks blood and some of the he-goats blood and put it atop the corners of the altar, all around.

verses.ar_he: וְיַדֵי עֲלוֹהִי מִן דְמָא בְּאֶצְבְּעֵהּ שְׁבַע זִמְנִין וִידַכִּנֵהּ וִיקַדְשִׁנֵהּ מִסוֹאֲבַת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: He shall sprinkle on it from the blood that is on his finger seven times and purify it and sanctify it from the impurities of Bnei Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: וִישֵׁיצֵי מִלְכַפָּרָא עַל קוּדְשָׁא וְעַל מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא וְעַל מַדְבְּחָא וִיקָרֵב יָת צְפִירָא חַיָא
verses.ar_en: When he finishes atoning for the Holy [Sanctuary] and [for] the Tent of Meeting and [for] the altar he shall bring the live he-goat.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסְמוֹךְ אַהֲרֹן יָת תַּרְתֵּין יְדוֹהִי עַל רֵישׁ צְפִירָא חַיָא וִיוַדֵי עֲלוֹהִי יָת כָּל עֲוָיַת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְיָת כָל מֶרְדֵיהוֹן לְכָל חֲטָּאֵיהוֹן וְיִתֵּן יָתְהוֹן עַל רֵישׁ צְפִירָא וִישַׁלַח בְּיַד גְבַר דִזְמִין לִמְהַךְ לְמַדְבְּרָא
verses.ar_en: Aharon shall lay his two hands on the head of the live he-goat and confess on it all the iniquities of Bnei Yisroel and all their rebellious transgressions for all their sins, and put them on the head of the goat and send it away with the man [so] designated, to [go to] the desert.

verses.ar_he: וְיִטוֹל צְפִירָא עֲלוֹהִי יָת כָּל חוֹבֵיהוֹן לְאַרְעָא דְלָא יָתְבָא וִישַׁלַח יַת צְפִירָא בְּמַדְבְּרָא
verses.ar_en: The goat shall carry upon itself all of their iniquities to a desolate [an uninhabited] land, and [the man shall] send the goat into the desert.

verses.ar_he: וְיֵיעוֹל אַהֲרֹן לְמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא וְיַשְׁלַח יָת לְבוּשֵׁי בוּצָא דִי לְבַשׁ בְּמֵעֲלֵהּ לְקוּדְשָׁא וְיַצְנִעוּן תַּמָן
verses.ar_en: Aharon will [then] come into the Tent of Meeting and remove the linen garments that he wore when he came into the Holy [Sanctuary] and place [hide] them there.

verses.ar_he: וְיַסְחֵי יָת בִּסְרֵהּ בְּמַיָא בַּאֲתַר קַדִישׁ וְיִלְבַּשׁ יָת לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיִפּוֹק וְיַעְבֵּד יָת עֲלָתֵהּ וְיָת עֲלַת עַמָא וִיכַפַּר עֲלוֹהִי וְעַל עַמָּא
verses.ar_en: He shall wash his flesh in water in a sacred place and don his garments. He shall go out and do (offer) his burnt-offering and the peoples burnt-offering and atone on his behalf and on behalf of the people.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת תַּרְבָּא דְחַטָאתָא יַסֵק לְמַדְבְּחָא
verses.ar_en: The fat of the sin-offering, he shall burn on the altar.

verses.ar_he: וּדְמוֹבִיל יָת צְפִירָא לַעֲזָאזֵל יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי יָת בִּסְרֵהּ בְּמַיָא וּבָתַר כֵּן יֵיעוֹל לְמַשְׁרִיתָא
verses.ar_en: He who sends [brings] the goat to Azazel shall wash his garments, and bathe his body in water, and afterwards he shall come into the encampment.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת תּוֹרָא דְחַטָאתָא וְיָת צְפִירָא דְחַטָאתָא דִי אִתָּעַל מִדִמְהוֹן לְכַפָּרָא בְקוּדְשָׁא יִתַּפְּקוּן לְמִבָּרָא לְמַשְּׁרִיתָא וְיוֹקְדוּן בְּנוּרָא יָת מַשְׁכֵּיהוֹן וְיָת בִּסְרְהוֹן וְיָת אָכְלֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: The sin-offering-bullock and the sin-offering-goat whose blood was brought to achieve atonement in the Holy [Sanctuary], he shall have removed beyond the encampment. They shall burn in fire their skins, their flesh and their waste [that are in their intestines].

verses.ar_he: וּדְמוֹקִיד יָתְהוֹן יְצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי יָת בִּסְרֵהּ בְּמַיָא וּבָתַר כֵּן יֵיעוֹל למַשְׁרִיתָא
verses.ar_en: He who burns them shall wash his garments and bathe his body in water and afterwards he shall come into the encampment.

verses.ar_he: וּתְהֵי לְכוֹן לִקְיַם עָלָם בְּיַרְחָא שְׁבִיעָאָה בְּעַשְׂרָא לְיַרְחָא תְּעַנוּן יָת נַפְשָׁתֵיכוֹן וְכָל עִבִידָא לָא תַעְבְּדוּן יַצִיבָא וְגִיוֹרָא דְיִתְגַיְרוּן בֵּינֵיכוֹן
verses.ar_en: It shall be for an everlasting statute for you; in the seventh month, on the tenth of the month, you shall afflict yourselves and not do any work, the native-born [settled one] and the proselyte residing [that converts] among you.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי בְיוֹמָא הָדֵין יְכַפֵּר עֲלֵיכוֹן לְדַכָּאָה יָתְכוֹן מִכָּל חוֹבֵיכוֹן קֳדָם יְיָ תִּדְכּוּן
verses.ar_en: For on this day He will make atonement for you, to purify you from all your sins, before Adonoy, you will be purified.

verses.ar_he: שְׁבַת שְׁבָתָא הִיא לְכוֹן וּתְעַנוּן יָת נַפְשָּׁתֵיכוֹן קְיַם עֲלָם
verses.ar_en: It is a Shabbos of Shabbosos to you and you must afflict yourselves; it is an everlasting statute.

verses.ar_he: וִיכַפֵּר כַּהֲנָא דִי רַבִּי יָתֵהּ וְדִי יְקָרֵב יָת קֻרְבָּנֵהּ לְשַׁמָשָׁא תְּחוֹת אֲבוּהִי וְיִלְבַּשׁ יָת לְבוּשֵׁי בוּצָא לבוּשֵׁי קוּדְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: The kohein will atone—he who himself will be anointed [inaugurated to greatness] and who will be initiated—[offer his sacrifice] to serve in his fathers stead and dress in the linen garments, the sacred garments.

verses.ar_he: וִיכַפֵּר עַל מִקְדַשׁ קוּדְשָׁא וְעַל מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא וְעַל מַדְבְּחָא יְכַפַּר וְעַל כַּהֲנַיָא וְעַל כָּל עַמָא דִקְהָלָא יְכַפַּר
verses.ar_en: He will atone for the Holy [Sanctuary]; and for the Tent of Meeting and for the altar, he will atone; for the kohanim and for the entire people of the congregation, he will atone.

verses.ar_he: וּתְהֵי דָא לְכוֹן לִקְיַם עָלָם לְכַפָּרָא עַל בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל מִכָּל חוֹבֵיהוֹן חֲדָא בְּשַׁתָּא וַעֲבַד כְּמָא דִי פַּקִיד יְיָ יָת מֹשֶׁה
verses.ar_en: This shall be for you as an everlasting statute, to achieve atonement for Bnei Yisroel from all their sins, once a year. He did as Adonoy commanded Moshe.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם מֹשֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying:

verses.ar_he: מַלֵל עִם אַהֲרֹן וְעִם בְּנוֹהִי וְעִם כָּל בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְתֵימַר לְהוֹן דֵין פִּתְגָמָא דִי פַקִיד יְיָ לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Speak to Aharon and to his sons and to all Bnei Yisroel and say to them; this is the edict that Adonoy commanded, saying:

verses.ar_he: גְבַר גְבַר מִבֵּית יִשְׂרָאֵל דִי יִכּוֹס תּוֹר אוֹ אִמַר אוֹ עִזָא בְּמַשְׁרִיתָא אוֹ דִי יִכּוֹס מִבָּרָא לְמַשְׁרִיתָא
verses.ar_en: Each and every person of the House of Israel who will slaughter an ox, lamb, or goat within the encampment or who will slaughter [it] beyond the encampment.

verses.ar_he: וְלִתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא לָא אַיְתֵהּ לְקָרָבָא קֻרְבָּנָא קֳדָם יְיָ קֳדָם מַשְׁכְּנָא דַיְיָ דְמָא יִתְחַשַׁב לְגַבְרָא הַהוּא דְמָא אֲשַׁד וְיִשְׁתֵּיצֵי אֲנָשָׁא הַהוּא מִגוֹ עַמֵהּ
verses.ar_en: And to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting he did not bring it so that it may be brought as an offering to [before] Adonoy, before the Mishkan of Adonoy; it shall be considered for that person as blood, he has spilled blood, and that person shall be cut off from among his people.

verses.ar_he: בְּדִיל דִי יַיְתוּן בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל יָת דִבְחֵיהוֹן דִי אִנוּן דָבְחִין עַל אַפֵּי חַקְלָא וְיַיְתוּנוּן לָקֳדָם יְיָ לִתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא לְוָת כַּהֲנָא וְיִכְסוּן נִכְסַת קוּדְשִׁין קֳדָם יְיָ יָתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: So that Bnei Yisroel shall bring their sacrifices that they [would] slaughter on the field, and [instead] they shall bring them to [before] Adonoy to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting, to the kohein, and slaughter them as peace[sacred]-offerings to [before] Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וְיִזְרוֹק כַּהֲנָא יָת דְמָא עַל מַדְבְּחָא דַיְיָ בִּתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא וְיַסֵק תַּרְבָּא לְאִתְקַבָּלָא בְרַעֲוָא קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall sprinkle the blood on the altar of Adonoy at the entrance of the Tent of Meeting and burn the fat as a pleasing fragrance to [to be accepted with favor before] Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וְלָא יִדְבְּחוּן עוֹד יָת דִבְחֵיהוֹן לַשֵׁדִין דִי אִנוּן טָעָן בַּתְרֵיהוֹן קְיַם עָלָם תְּהֵי דָא לְהוֹן לְדָרֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: They shall no longer slaughter their sacrifices to the demons after which they go astray. This shall be an everlasting statute for them, for their descendants.

verses.ar_he: וּלְהוֹן תֵּימַר גְבַר גְבַר מִבֵּית יִשְׂרָאֵל וּמִן גִיוֹרָא דְיִתְגַיְרוּן בֵּינֵיכוֹן דִי יַסֵק עֲלָתָא אוֹ נִכְסַת קוּדְשַׁיָא
verses.ar_en: To them you shall say: each and every person of the House of Israel and from the proselyte who will reside [convert] among them, who will bring a burnt-offering or sacrifice [sacred-offering],

verses.ar_he: וְלִתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא לָא אַיְתִנֵהּ לְמֶעְבַּד יָתֵהּ קֳדָם יְיָ וְיִשְׁתֵּיצֵי אֲנָשָׁא הַהוּא מֵעַמֵהּ
verses.ar_en: and to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting he does not bring it, that it be offered to [before] Adonoy; that person shall be cut off from his people.

verses.ar_he: וּגְבַר גְבַר מִבֵּית יִשְׂרָאֵל וּמִן גִיוֹרָא דְיִתְגַיְרוּן בֵּינֵיכוֹן דִי יֵיכוּל כָּל דְמָא וְאֶתֵּן רוּגְזִי בַּאֲנָשָׁא דְיֵיכוּל יָת דְמָא וֶאֱשֵׁיצֵי יָתֵהּ מִגוֹ עַמֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Each and every person of the House of Israel and from the proselyte who resides [converts] among them who will eat any blood; I shall direct my anger on the soul of him [person] who eats the blood and I will cut it off from among its people.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי נְפַשׁ בִּסְרָא בִּדְמָא הִיא וַאֲנָא יְהָבִתֵּהּ לְכוֹן עַל מַדְבְּחָא לְכַפָּרָא עַל נַפְשָׁתֵיכוֹן אֲרֵי דְמָא הוּא עַל נַפְשָׁא מְכַפֵּר
verses.ar_en: For [the] soul of the body is in the blood and I have given it to you [to be placed] on the altar to achieve atonement for your souls, for it is the blood that will achieve atonement for the soul.

verses.ar_he: עַל כֵּן אֲמָרִית לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל כָּל אֱנַשׁ מִנְכוֹן לָא יֵיכוּל דְמָא וְגִיוֹרָא דְיִתְגַיְרוּן בֵּינֵיכוֹן לָא יֵיכוּל דְמָא
verses.ar_en: Therefore, I have said to Bnei Yisroel: Every soul [person] among you shall not eat blood. The proselyte residing [that converts] among you shall not eat blood.

verses.ar_he: וּגְבַר גְבַר מִן בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וּמִן גִיוֹרָא דְיִתְגַיְרוּן בֵּינֵיכוֹן דִי יְצוּד צֵידָא חַיְתָא אוֹ עוֹפָא דִי מִתְאֲכֵל וְיֵשׁוֹד יָת דְמֵהּ וִיכַסִנֵהּ בְּעַפְרָא
verses.ar_en: Each and every person of the House of Israel and from the proselyte residing [that converts] among them who will ensnare [the catch] any wild animal or fowl that is permitted to be eaten, he shall spill its blood and cover it with earth.

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי נְפַשׁ כָּל בִּסְרָא דְמֵהּ בְּנַפְשֵׁהּ הוּא וַאֲמָרִית לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל דַם כָּל בִּסְרָא לָא תֵיכְלוּן אֲרֵי נְפַשׁ כָּל בִּסְרָא דְמֵהּ הִיא כָּל דְיֵיכְלִנֵהּ יִשְׁתֵּיצֵי
verses.ar_en: For [as to] the life of all flesh, its blood is its life, and I have said to Bnei Yisroel: The blood of any flesh, you should not eat, for, the life of all flesh is its blood. Whoever eats of it, shall be cut off.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל אֱנַשׁ דִי יֵיכוּל נְבִילָא וּתְבִירָא בְּיַצִיבָא וּבְגִיוֹרָא וִיצַבַּע לְבוּשׁוֹהִי וְיַסְחֵי בְמַיָא וִיהֵי מְסָאָב עַד רַמְשָׁא וְיִדְכֵּי
verses.ar_en: Anybody that will eat an improperly slaughtered animal or an animal with a fatal defect among the native-born [settled one] and the proselyte, shall wash his clothing and bathe in water and is impure until the evening, and [then] becomes purified.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם לָא יְצַבַּע וּבִסְרֵהּ לָא יַסְחֵי וִיקַבֵּל חוֹבֵהּ
verses.ar_en: If he does not wash [his clothes] and does not bathe his flesh, he bears [the burden of] his iniquity.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם מֹשֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying.

verses.ar_he: מַלֵל עִם בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְתֵימַר לְהוֹן אֲנָא יְיָ אֱלָהָכוֹן
verses.ar_en: Speak to Bnei Yisroel and say to them I am Adonoy, your God.

verses.ar_he: כְּעוֹבָדֵי עַמָא דְאַרְעָא דְמִצְרַיִם דִי יְתֶבְתּוּן בַּהּ לָא תַעְבְּדוּן וּכְעוֹבָדֵי עַמָא דְאַרְעָא דִכְנַעַן דִי אֲנָא מָעֵל יָתְכוֹן תַּמָן לָא תַעְבְּדוּן וּבְנִימוֹסֵיהוֹן לָא תְהָכוּן
verses.ar_en: After the practice of the [people of the] Land of Egypt in which you have lived, you shall not do, and the practice of the [people of the] Land of Canaan, to which I am bringing you, you shall not do and you shall not follow their statutes [customs].

verses.ar_he: יָת דִינַי תַּעְבְּדוּן וְיָת קְיָמַי תִּטְרוּן לְהַלָכָא בְּהוֹן אֲנָא יְיָ אֱלָהָכוֹן
verses.ar_en: You shall fulfill My laws and you shall keep My statutes to follow them, I am Adonoy, your God.

verses.ar_he: וְתִטְרוּן יָת קְיָמַי וְיָת דִינַי דִי יַעְבֵּד יָתְהוֹן אֲנָשָׁא וְיֵחֵי בְהוֹן לְחַיֵי עָלְמָא אֲנָא יְיָ
verses.ar_en: You shall keep My statutes and My laws which if a man obeys he shall live through them [in the World to Come]; I am Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: גְבַר גְבַר לְכָל קָרִיב בִּסְרֵהּ לָא תִקְרְבוּן לְגַלָאָה עֶרְיָא אֲנָא יְיָ
verses.ar_en: Each and every person—to any of his close kin—You shall not approach to uncover [their] nakedness, I am Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: עֶרְיַת אֲבוּךְ וְעֶרְיַת אִמָךְ לָא תְגַלֵי אִמָךְ הִיא לָא תְגַלֵי עֶרְיָתָהּ
verses.ar_en: The nakedness of your father and the nakedness of your mother you shall not uncover; she is your mother, you shall not uncover her nakedness.

verses.ar_he: עֶרְיַת אִתַּת אָבוּךְ לָא תְגַלֵי עֶרְיַת אָבוּךְ הִיא
verses.ar_en: The nakedness of your fathers wife you shall not uncover; it is your fathers nakedness.

verses.ar_he: עֶרְיַת אֲחָתָךְ בַּת אֲבוּךְ אוֹ בַת אִמָךְ דִילִידָא מִן אֲבוּךְ מִן אִתַּת אָחֳרִי אוֹ מִן אִמָךְ לִגְבַר אָחֳרָן לָא תְגַלֵי עֶרְיַתְהֶן
verses.ar_en: The nakedness of your sister [whether she is] your fathers daughter or your mothers daughter; whether she is born in the house [to your father from another woman], or she is born outside [to your mother from another man], you shall not uncover their nakedness.

verses.ar_he: עֶרְיַת בַּת בְּרָךְ אוֹ בַת בְּרַתָּךְ לָא תְגַלֵי עֶרְיַתְהֶן אֲרֵי עֶרְיְתָךְ אִנוּן
verses.ar_en: The nakedness of your sons daughter or your daughters daughter; you shall not uncover their nakedness, for their nakedness is your own.

verses.ar_he: עֶרְיַת בַּת אִתַּת אֲבוּךְ דִילִידָא מִן אֲבוּךְ אֲחָתָךְ הִיא לָא תְגַלֵי עֶרְיָתָהּ
verses.ar_en: The nakedness of the daughter of your fathers wife who is born to your father; she is your sister, you shall not uncover her nakedness.

verses.ar_he: עֶרְיַת אֲחַת אֲבוּךְ לָא תְגַלֵי קָרִיבַת אֲבוּךְ הִיא
verses.ar_en: The nakedness of your fathers sister you shall not uncover; she is your fathers kin.

verses.ar_he: עֶרְיַת אֲחַת אִמָךְ לָא תְגַלֵי אֲרֵי קָרִיבַת אִמָךְ הִיא
verses.ar_en: The nakedness of your mothers sister you shall not uncover, for she is your mothers kin.

verses.ar_he: עֶרְיַת אַח אֲבוּךְ לָא תְגַלֵי לְאִתְּתֵהּ לָא תִקְרַב אִתַּת אַח אֲבוּךְ הִיא
verses.ar_en: The nakedness of your fathers brother you shall not uncover. You shall not approach his wife, she is your aunt [the wife of your father’s brother].
